021.content:
Summery




One day at the NanoCorps Headquarter, Quentin and the co. receive an anonymous message that wants to hire one of the Corps in assisting the two captains that were supposed to pay off his company's debt. Though curious, Quentin accepts the request and was about to select X for a speedy and successful mission until Amber, the ditzy Majin, jumps in front of Quentin, begging him to let her take the solo mission for the first time. After some thoughts (and annoyed by her begging), Quentin agrees to let Amber go and Beta, using the messenger's coordinates, wraps the joyful Majin to the captains' last location. The two captains should be grateful for receiving help from the Corps...in a rather gigantic way..
021.title: Amber and the Pikmin

choices: All three arrive at a snowy area
0211.content:
In a different dimension...



Hocotate Freight is a long-haul, deep-space shipping company that is located on a planet called Hocotate. One day, its only employee of any merit, Captain Olimar, was hit by an asteroid and crashed on an uncharted planet while on a vacation. However, he was aided by mysterious creatures which he called Pikmin. With all the ship parts is gathered and fix up, Captain Olimar escaped the uncharted planet. But in Olimar's absence, his employer, Hocotate Freight, ran into a rather...fiancial problem...

As Olimar flew into the Hocotate's atmosphere and safely landed at the Hocotate Freight site where he is greeted by the President of the Hocotate Freight and the local yet dimwit employee Louie. Olimar jumps out the ship with a bottle cap-like object in his hands, expecting a good greeting from the President, though it was more than a delivery of bad news.

"Ahh, Olimar! I'm so glad you are safe! Yes, very glad. Quite glad..." said the President. "But...sadly, I have an announcement that is...not so glad: Our company is going under. Yes, we're finished..."

"Wh-What? What happened, sir?" Olimar asked.

"Well...on his first mission, Louie here met a vicious and ravenous space bunny...and an entire load of golden Pikpik brand carrots was eaten!" The President said while imitating a space bunny eating the carrots.

"That's terrible!"

"Oh, that wasn't the terrible part. I took out an enormous loan to repay the debt from this loss! I decided to sell off corporate assets to repay the loan, but..."

Olimar then heard a siren, spotting a flying machine with a large claw underneath heading this way. The machine grabbed the ship by the claw and flew away with it.

"...That was the only asset we have to sale, mainly your ship, the S.S. Dolphin. But sadly, that wasn't enough...right now the rest of loan is now total...10,100 Pokos."

"Th-That much!?"

"Yes...and we have no means to repay it!"

Olimar was stunned at the huge loan, so stunned that he dropped the object, rolling up to Louie's feet.

"Oh! What is that, Olimar?" the President asked,

"Huh? Oh, it's a souvenir I found on the planet for my kid."

Suddenly, an old ship, known as Hocotate ship, begins to speak. "Treasure! Treasure! Treasure! Money! Money! Money! Money!" it then opens the hatch and beams up the object. "Initiating valuation of the recovered treasure. This artifact is worth...100 Pokos!"

"Wh-Wh-What!?" The President sputters then becomes amazed at this object's value. The loan he must pay off is now 10,000 Pokos.

"This thing is worth 100 Pokos!? That's more than a year's salary!"

"Hush up, you! Olimar! You did say that it was from the planet you were stranded on!?"

"Yes sir and there are more of them, some even bigger than that artifact." said Olimar.

"WHAT!?! That's wonderful to hear! Now I can repay the debt!" The President shouted with joy before turning his attention to Louie. "Louie, you dolt! Look alive! You must depart immediately with Captain Olimar!"

The two captains look at each for a moment until they both nodded in agreement and got onboard the Hocotate ship.

"Good luck, you two and bring me those-ooooh!" The President was blown away as the ship takes off into the air.

Satisfy of how to pay off the debt, the President trouts away to go check on his wife until a paper materializes in thin air, hitting the President's face.

"Oof! What the..?" The President grabs the paper, reading of what it said. "Hmm...NanoCorps...the best mercenaries in the universe...? Will work for free...? Hmmm...well, Olimar can handle himself, but Louie...hmm...perhaps I could hire one..." The President nodded before resuming his victory trout. Oblivious to the President, an unknown figure, standing on top of a sign, watching the event unfold, letting out a familiar laugh before he disappears...




Meanwhile, in the NanoCorps' dimension, inside FlameHeart Keep...





The NanoCorps, greatest mercenaries in the world, have been busy lately. Thanks to Zeke's idea of spreading their info around not just their world, but different worlds. Looking through different requests from the computer, Beta received an anonymous requester that is not from this world or rather their dimension.

"Master Andross. I require your assistance."

"What's up, Beta?"

"It seems we received a request from an unknown sender that is not from our world or other known worlds. The coordinates seem to be...off."

"Hmm...pull it up."

Beta activates a hologram from his chest, revealing the sender's words.

"Let see...'company in debt'...'need help to assist the two captains'...'find artifacts to pay off debt'...sounds like this Hocotate Freight company is in trouble and this person wants our help to find treasures."

"I have a solution: Why don't we pay off their debt?"

"We could, but don't wanna hear Dave's ranting and crap, and he will shoot you for leaning others some money...which I need to talk about.

"Another solution: Sending X, our fastest member, will get the job done quickly."

"Now that's a good idea. I'll contact X after he's done with his mission and-" Quentin heard a feminine voice from behind followed by a rather soft sensation on top of his head. Figuring out who it is, Quentin sighs in annoyance. "...Amber, what is it?"

"Booosssss~! Let me take the mission!" Amber, the ditzy Majin, said while wrapping her long arms around the Drangua. "I haven't done a solo mission like forever! Please let me take it!"

"I don't know-"

"Pleeeeeeaaassssseee~? Pretty please with candy on top?"

"That's 'cherry' on top and I'm not sure you are ready-" Quentin felt Amber's grip is getting tighter and her bosom pushing down even more.

"I'm not letting you go until you say yes!" Amber grins.

"Ugh...Vixen will be upset if she sees this...alright alright, you got the job. Beta, send her to her destination" Quentin sighs, feeling the pressure off of him with Amber jumps for joy.

"Follow me, Master Amber."

"Thanks, boss! I'll try my best not to mess it up!"

"Let's hope not...ahem, yes, good luck, Amber! Contact us if you need anything!

Amber nods and follows Beta to the wrapping device located in his laboratory. Quentin sighs once more knowing that Amber would probably screw this one up due to her...clumsy nature. But he should give her a chance...it's just a simple treasure hunting mission...right?

"...I'll check on her on every 30 minutes...just in case."
0211.title: Company in Debt and Savoir to the Rescue

02111.content:
In a snowy location known as Vally of Repose...



A bright portal emerges out of thin air and Amber, who was waving goodbye to Beta, steps out on the snow-covered ground. As the portal disappears, Amber begins to survey the area as part of the rule of NanoCorps if venturing into an unknown territory though there appears to be nothing but snow, tree stumps, and a little pound.

"...Hellooooo? Is anyone out here!?" Amber shouted. Her voice echoes across the area but no response. "Captain!? Are you here!? I'm the one you hired!" Again, no response. "Huh...he's not here...guess I'll wait for his arrival."

Amber sighs, brushing her hair aside from her face, looks up at the falling snow which increases the amount of snow and wind, while waiting for the captains...until she spots something in the corner of her eye, something flashing.

"Hmm? What is that?"



Inside the Hocotate ship...





Captain Olimar and Louie have entered the snowy region and forced to fly through a blizzard, dodging branches. It was doing well until the ship came to close to one of the branches.

"Gah!? Brace yourself!" Olimar said, bracing for impact.

"Huh? Brace for wha-"

The ship hits the branch, knocking off Louie into the snowy area. The ship with Olimar inside manages to drop with a thud, ejecting the leader to the ground.

"Oof...that was a rough landing..."

"Brrrzzzt! You're telling me!" The ship communicates with the captain. "Good thing I have adverted a crash landing. Running diagnostics...Alert! Alert! Louie is missing!"

"What!?"

"He must have fallen off his cockpit from the impact...and he is not responding via his communicator. He is either flouting protocol or in danger! Captain Olimar! You must find Louie before he freezes to death in the cold of this planet-wait a minute...Captain! Look over there!"

"Huh?" Olimar looks up, spotting five familiar leaf-headed red figures battling a small creature known as Dwarf Red Bulborb. "Is that...the Pikmin?"

"These are the Pikmin? They need your help as we speak! Call out to them!"

Olimar quickly gets up and got close to the fight before whistling the Pikmin. Hearing the familiar sound, the Pikmin comes running to Olimar, remembering him.

"I'm glad to see you guys again! Now let's take care of that monster!" Olimar grabs one of the Pikmin and throws it at the Bulborb's back with others follow pursuit. With few beatings, the Bulborb was defeated and the Pikmin return to Olimar's side.
Olimar is glad to see the Red Pikmin is alright and wondering where are the other Pikmin, but right now, he must find Louie before he's a goner. The only path he can search is straight ahead but it is blocked by an unknown brownish object. Olimar throws five Pikmin on top of it, but it will not budge.

"Oh dear...seems I need to find more Pikmin, but there's no Onion in sight...I wonder..."

"Captain Olimar!" the ship communicate. "I have good news and really bad news!"

"Uh-oh...what's the good news?"

"I have just re-established my communications link with Louie, seems to be doing okay! Though I'm really worried about his conditions..."

"What do you mean?"

"Well...the really bad news is he's on a life form...a MASSIVE life form. I cannot get any details of this creature but perhaps Louie can explain...unless he's in up inside the creature's belly."

"O-Oh my..." As Olimar worries about Louie's safety, he heard a loud booming sound that wasn't far. Could this be the massive creature's voice? Whatever this is, the captain is very worried about Louie...



Meanwhile, in Louie's current location...




Amber's POV

Amber watches a small object entering the snow and crash into one of the tree branches, and a tiny figure was flown out and heading straight towards her. The Majin didn't react in time as the figure ends up diving into her shirt, between her large breasts.

"Oh!" Amber gasped, causing her breasts to wobble a bit. "What was that...? Is it a bug? It better not stealing my candies!" Amber huffs before pressing her breasts in order to prevent the 'bug' descending. Using one of her hand to hold her breast, Amber begins fishing out of whatever it is that plop into her bosom. Feeling movements between her boobs, she was able to locate the intruder and grabs it, pulling out of her cleavage and as she opens her hand, she is rather surprised of what she saw: A very tiny creature with glowing blue antenna and dressed as a spaceman.

"Aww, a tiny person! Hello there!" Amber grins, waving at him. "Are you alright?"



Louie's POV


Louie is rather having a difficult time. He was flown off the ship by the impact, crashed landed on a soft and squishy surface, bouncing like crazy from the shaking, being picked up, and now facing what is possibly the biggest monster he ever saw. Standing on the landscape of pink surface which is the creature's hand, Louie is literally petrified by the sight of the monster: It has long black 'fur' on its head, red eyes that look very menacing, two long tentacles from its neck, black nails on its fingers, and a huge mouth that could devour the entire civilization! Even when it opens its mouth, he could see a row of sharp teeth, a massive blue tongue that is waiting for its prey and, the worst of all, the endless abyss that is waiting behind that hanging 'guardian', welcoming its prey to their doom.

The creature starts talking to him, couldn't understand its words due to its loud booming voice, but able to make out of the last words.

"ARE YOU ALRIGHT?"

The creature seems to be rather concerned about him...or it could be a trap...but he must response or this monster might eat him. He quickly nodded, acknowledging it that he is okay.

"GOOD TO HEAR! NOW WHY WERE YOU IN MY CLEAVAGE? ARE YOU TRYING TO STEAL MY CANDY?"

Still can't understand its booming voice and still terrified, he simply shook his head.

"AWW, ARE YOU SCARED OF ME? DON'T WORRY, I'M A FRIENDLY GIANT! MY NAME IS AMBER, PLEASE TO MEET YA!" The creature grins and winks at him. "OH...THIS SOUNDS SILLY, BUT ARE YOU RELATED TO THE COMPANY CALLED HOCOTATE FREIGHT? I WAS HIRED BY THE COMPANY TO ASSIST SOME CAPTAINS IN SEARCH OF TREASURE. PERHAPS...YOU ARE ONE OF THE CAPTAINS?"

Louie able to understand what Amber was saying and knowing this monster won't harm him and was surprised that it knows the company and that it was hired to help Olimar and himself in search for treasures. Louie quickly nodded to her, feeling quite relieved.

"YOU ARE!? THAT'S GREAT! THOUGH IT'S KINDA WEIRD THEY DIDN'T MENTION THAT YOU'RE VERY SMALL...SMALLER THAN RICHIE...BUT A JOB'S A JOB! THE FRIENDLY MAJIN AMBER REPORTING FOR DUTY!" Amber gives a thumbs up, ready to begin the job.

Louie sighs with relief that this monster-this Amber is here to help them...but he still needs to rejoin Olimar and explains of his new and very huge ally...
02111.title: The Arrival and Louie's Misfortune

04.content:
NanoCorps x Size Matters



Based on Uru's game, Size Matters, but this time with a little...well, BIG twist.

While chasing down the notorious wanted man, Gentleman of Darkness (G.O.D), Quentin, along with Vixen, Coventina, Cross, and Revenant corner the shadow man, ordering him and his goons to surrender. G.O.D, laughing at them, opens his shadowy portal and he and his goons enter the portal. Not wanted the shadow man to escape, Quentin and his team enters the portal and find themselves in another world where they will meet a certain hero who is on the quest to defeat the Demon Lord and a girl, claimed to be a goddess, is tracking down someone who stole her powers.

G.O.D, meanwhile. ends up in another world just like the NanoCorps, but this time it's a bit different and there he and his goons will meet a mysterious maid and her master and soon, and surprisingly, work together to gain each of their goals: To gain power for the universe conquest and to destroy his arch enemy.



(All characters, places, items, etc. in Size Matter belong to Uru)
04.title: NanoCorps x Uru's Size Matters

041.content:
The sun rises beyond the sea, shining throughout the land with its beam of light shines across the city, birds chirping to their heart content, and animals frolicked among the forest. It seems it will be another peaceful morning...until the authorities called the police as they witness a familiar figure wearing a gentleman suit and a top hat, and is surrounded by menacing like aura who happens to be the notorious wanted man, Gentleman of Darkness or G.O.D for short.

The shadow has made off with millions of dollars from robbing a bank, a typical robbery for him. The shadow man was stopped by the police earlier, but he made quick work on them before he runs off once more. As he enters the alley to where the headquarter is just a few blocks away, G.O.D heard a sound of a string being pulled and immediately halted at his track, just before an arrow zip past his head, puncture the wall. He was then surrounded by a sudden appearance of a group of 5 (8 if counted the archers of Knights of the Abyss 12) blocking his escape route. G.O.D already knew who stopped him and grumbles, it was his archnemesis, the NanoCorps.

"Why you always getting in my way, dragon boy?" The shadow man growls at Quentin.

"What do you think? Now hand over the stolen cash and surrender!" Quentin ordered the shadow man.

"And what if I say no?"

"Then prepare for your punishment, impudent being." The Seasnaga hisses.

G.O.D, grinning, lifts his cane up. "Oh I wish I could stay and receive my punishment, but I have other things to take care of, ta ta~!" He then taps the ground and a shadowy portal appears beneath his feet and submerged into the black portal not before the shadow man laughs at them.

"And he got away...great," Cross sighs.

"Unless we go after him, the portal is still active." Vixen walks over to the portal.

"We should be cautious. We don't know what this portal will lead us." said the knight.

"Indeed, so let's stick together and follow me!" Quentin shouted before jumping into the portal while the others jump in one by one. The NanoCorps will go through another journey to stop the shadow man from creating chaos and harming innocent people, but they will encounter 2 allies from another realm they will gladly aid them...although, G,O.D will too, gain an ally.


The realm is a world full of swords and sorcery.
Once, there was a time when its land was overrun by malicious monsters. Nightmarish monsters who would slaughter mean and dine upon their souls.
And commanding these fiends was none other than the Demon King.
Innocents were forced to spend their lives cowering in the shade of these monsters. It was at this point that a hero arrived.
However, talented as the young might be, he could not hold the power to fight against the fearsome Demon King.
The hero and his allies have no choice but to trained to break through their limit, day after day, level by level.
The time has finally come, when they'd trained their collective minds and bodies as much as their human limit would allow them...and the time to slay the Demon King.
A whole year has passed since the decisive yet victorious battle and the world has been peace ever since...
That is...until that fateful morn...
041.title: When Two Worlds Collide

1.content:
...Nearly midnight...



After another successful mission is complete, which rescuing a hostage from a deranged criminal, the famous group of mercenaries NanoCorps, returns to their headquarter, the Flameheart Keep, is closing up for the night and have the time to themselves...that is until Vixen Vex, a member of NanoCorps and girlfriend of the leader, brought a mysterious package that appears on the doorstep after seeing an object appear at the entrance out of nowhere and it has an unusual signature on top of the package...

It looks like a face with a mask and glasses on while doing a V sign. The hunters don't know it could be from a big fan or something, but they decided to open the package. Inside the box is a strange device and a letter beside it...Quentin Andross, the Drangua leader, opens the letter while Danny, the joking woman lover recon, messes with the device but was swiped from his hands by Zeke, co-leader and a wise old gunman. Quentin reads out loud to the mercenaries to see what the mysterious letter have to say...



Greetings!

I am Dr. Van Micro, the greatest scientist in the world! I heard you are the best hunters around here...If so, then allow me to offer you a mission that could be very challenging and hard to refuse. I sent you my latest creation that allows you, mercenaries, to travel through time and space, into different dimensions. From there, I will send you a list of wanted names and I need to see the body of that targets...It's not like I don't trust you hunters or anything, just wanted to see how mighty and powerful you hunters are...Oh yes, two things I must tell you: Since you are called NanoCorps...I added the device to change your size, making you smaller. A bit smaller than an ant...and the second thing is...the targets are all females! Let's just say I have a thing for big gals~ MWHAHAHAHAHA! Good luck out there hunters! I will reward you handsomely and look forward to your success...that is if you lot survive!.MWHAHAHAHA!

Signed,
Dr. Van Micro: Manly Genius




After finish reading the letter, Quentin and the others look at each other with confusion and skeptical. Viz Archer, the tough and cold hunter with two robotic arms, shake his head in disbelief and protest on taking the mission.

"You have got to be kidding me," Viz said in his angry tone. "I'm not gonna run around killing women just for fun, especially while we're being a size of an ant."

"Siding with Viz here for once, that guy is a quack! Sounded like he treating us like test subjects!" Petrie, one of the Three Recon Stooges said.

"Ugh..." Ella, a member who has incredible ESP powers, groans at the cursed word she once endures.

"Eeep! S-Sorry, Ella...Anyway, it's closing time for us! We'll do it in the morning."

"Yeah, let's just ignore his request, for now, my favorite program is about to come on..." Ralph, second of the Recon Stooges, said in sarcastic tone.

"And I'm getting hungry." Sharper, the last of the Recon Stooges said while rubbing his stomach.

"You always hungry, ya eejit!" Petrie smacks the hungry merc on the head.

"Yep...sounds like a plan to me..." Slick, a powerful but lazy telekinesis said as he yawns while laying on the couch, scratching his butt.

"Now hold on, guys. Remember one of the rules? 'No matter how ridiculous it is, we must grin and bear it.' Right? " Quentin said, looking at every mercenary in the room, which all the hunters gave a simple nod. "If Beta confirms that the device is working and able to use it, we're taking it. If not, we will kindly reply back to the doc it does not work and be done with it for tonight."

"Hmph...I don't mind, it does sound challenging." The Namekian hunter, Orn, said...which is quite rare for him to say it.

"I'm with the big jolly green guy!" The womanizer Danny said, patting against Orn's back. "Especially the shrinking and women part...All the things we can do while shrunken and on a female's body...!" Danny's perverted thoughts begin overtaken his mind.

"You do know I have the ability to change sizes, right?" said Aradia, the strongest mage in the group.

"Yeah, but you lovely ladies are just too stingy of not letting us climb your bodies." Danny grins at the mage before an enraged princess, Alanna, wacks him on the head with the sword's hilt.

"Stupid idiot." Alanna, the hotheaded elf princess member of NanoCorps, huffs in annoyance before turning her attention to Quentin. "Are we serious accepting it?"

"Part of the rules, Alanna."

"Dammit...I really hate that rule and I'm starting to hate Micro now."

"Now now, my sweet elf." Danny swoons over to Alanna with a big bump on his head. "No need to get your hands dirty. Let us fellas beat Micro up...and maybe you can give me a smooch." The womanizer pucker his lips, making sounds before the now angered Alanna kicks him in the gut.

While the mercs continue their conversation, Beta begins scanning the device. The device has a knob on the right side and a button on the left, an antenna sticking out on the top and a screen at the center. It doesn't take for Beta to figure the device out and begins to press a button. A sudden burst of blue light appears in front of the hunters, creating a strange portal.

"I take it the device works?" Quentin said.

"Affirmative."

"Well looks like we're taking the job," Quentin smirks at Viz, curses to himself.

"That's...great I guess?" Sumiye, the superhuman officer, sighs.

"I know, I know. I don't like it either, but rules are rules...and he did say he'll reward us, if not, then I'll allow you, girls, to beat him up till he does." Quentin grins.

"I like that plan." Sapphire, A female Roegadyn member, smirks while cracking her knuckles.

"Can we go now? I wanna take a nap after we done with the mission..." Rive, the blue-skinned Saiyan, yawns loudly before getting a flick on the head by her teacher Zyla.

"Hold on, kids. We can't just rush in there without knowing where we end up. It'll be safer if we do a 10-man squad. Quentin and I will go on ahead and we will contact you on who will come with us. Sounds good to you all?" Zeke asks the members which they all agree...except for Slick who is already asleep.

"Sounds good to me. Pack up your equipment in case we select one of you guys...and keep an eye on Slick. He's already knocked out."

"Every damn time...wake up, idiot!".Shigeyoshi, a fearsome demon samurai, slaps Slick on the head, waking himself up.

"Be careful in there, Quentin," Vixen said while giving him a quick nuzzle against his cheek.

"Don't worry, we'll be alright. Remeber, guys! Be ready when called on!"

With that settle, Quentin and Zeke enter the portal while the others, not without a few grumbles, ready themselves for this interesting mission. Little did they know that this strange mission...isn't what it seems to be...


-------------


...At Dr. Micro's laboratory...




Dr. Van Micro watches the bounty hunters enter the portal from the computer screen, rubbing his hands with glee before turning around to face a certain guest that help him with the 'mission'.

"Everything according to plan, partner...now you did promise me for that big cash reward, right?"

The person he was talking to is a shadowy tall slim being who is made of darkness, has glowing red eyes and mouth and shadow like fog appears beneath his feet. He wears a black three-piece gentleman's suit, black shoes, top hat, and long cape and carries a black sword hidden cane. He is well known for being the most wanted man in the world and a great enemy to the NanoCorps who are unable to catch him thanks to his cloning ability and almost covering the world in darkness before being thwarted by the hunters, the mysterious creature doesn't have a real name, but many people call him Gentleman of Darkness or 'G.O.D' for short.

"Dohohoho! Of course, I did promise you a lovely sack of money once the NanoCorps are dead...no objections?" The shadow man asked.

"Well, I don't have any ill will against them..." Micro said before grabbing a wad of cash, throwing them into the air, making all the cash rain down while giggling maniacally. "Then again, with all the money I have here, I think I do have a little grudge against them! Death to the NanoCorps?

"Death to the NanoCorps, dohohoho!"

The two laugh evilly before watching the leaders of NanoCorps enter the portal to a new destination and to their 'doom'. Will the NanoCorps be able to succeed this 'mission' or will G.O.D have his revenge...?
1.title: One Last Mission for the Night

1133.title: More Boot-err Ladies...

11331.content:
(Selected group: Quentin, Zeke, Danny, Slick, Viz, Petrie, Shaper, Ralph, Jackle, Ryx, and Reverent)



The selected NanoCorps' members had made their way out of the portal into somewhat familiar surroundings, only that it is bigger. It appears the mercs are in someone's bedroom with the sunlight shining through the windows, brighten the room and the furniture seems to be quite fancy...almost a bit royalty.

"Whoa! Check out the bed, it's huge! Way bigger than Atomic's!" Petrie said, pointed at the bed.

"Looks like Micro's device really works...I need to ask him if he got a spare..." Danny chuckled at the thought of shrinking down to size and spy on his fellow female members.

"Be glad any girls are here with us or they'll beat the shit out of you..." Quentin sighs.

"Yeah, yeah. Now, where's that dumbass at? I'm ready for some action!" Jackle shouted.

"I resent that comment, boy!" The voice turns out to be Dr. Micro which is coming from their communication. "Glad to see you NanoCorps have arrived safely. Who knows what terrible things could of happen if it goes completely wrong...mwahaha!"

"Sounds like you want us to get hurt..." said Viz. "But anyway, who are we gonna kill?"

"Straight to business, are we? Very well...your first target should be easy as pie cause she has no Devil Fruit powers."

"Devil Fruits?" Quentin said.

"Devil Fruits are mystical fruits found in this dimension that can give the eater many different and varying kinds of amusing power, depending on the type and variation of the fruit itself," The doctor explains. "As for her profile...Her name is Nefeltari Vivi, princess of Alabasta, the desert kingdom! A blue-haired beauty with a smile that warms your heart and admires by both the citizens and her family...and also men who try to offer their marriage to her.".

"Hot Damn! Sounds like I hit the jackpot!" Danny shouted with glee.

"Yeah, but uhh...she's a...you know..." said Sharper.

"We'll figure this out...sounds splendid, doc! WPetrieet right on it!" said Petire.

"Excellent! I will await your results, good luck, NanoCorps! Do come back alive...mwhahaha!" Micro laughs before signing off.

"Welp...I hate that bastard already." Viz sighs.

"We know...so, any plans how to deceive the doc?"

"I'm thinking, kid, but we should locate her first," said Zeke.

"Easier said than done, how are we gonna find her at this size?" said Ralph.

"My goggles have a heat sensor and x-ray attachment, so it should be easy to find her-oh, well speak of the devil, I found her."

"Already? Where?"

"By...that door."

Once Zeke pointed at the door, a very loud booming sound coming from behind it. .As the mercs turn around to see the very large door, the same booming sound has gotten louder and louder. The door suddenly open slowly, revealing a woman with long blue hair in a dress and blue wedges. Some mercs were in awe of her massive size and her stunning appearance, especially Danny who couldn't keep his eyes off of her.

"Blue hair...beautiful...yep, this is Vivi," said Quentin. "...And now we should move away."

"Why? Cause she's royalty and all and we should bow down to her?" said Jackle.

"Well, yeah. You suppose to show respect to royalties and also..." Before he continues, a familiar feeling of the ground trembling and the ear splitting booming noises interrupt him and the hunters notice a massive shadow falls before them. They all look up to see a sky of blue sole headed straight for them.

"She's heading our way."

"Holy crap!!" Sharper yells and begins to panic. "We're done for!"

"I totally want to die under her feet..." Danny still mesmerized by her beauty.

"Slick! Get us out of here!"

"Fine..." Slick said yawning before surrounding himself and the others in a purple aura and with a snap, the mercs vanish into thin air right before Vivi's foot made contact to the ground where they used to be.

With the NanoCorps escaping their demise, the sloth ended up taking them....
11331.title: Princess of Alabasta

114331.content:
(The selected members: Quentin, Zeke, Dave, Orn, Froze, Alpha, Zark, Skylar, Zealot, and Danny)



The selected NanoCorps have successfully made it through the portal into their new location and landed on the floor safely, it seems they are in someone's room as they scan the area, however, there is one thing that catches their eyes; a doll on the bed and it's not just one, there are many dolls on the bed, big and small, and some are sitting on the bookshelf and hanging on the hooks. Even some painting and pictures that are one the wall have the same person along with towels with the person's face that said 'Gray-sama Love' with a heart at the end. The mercs believe this is a girl's room and seemingly in love with this person Gray.

"Shit..and I thought Danny was crazy," Dave chuckles.

"Hey! I'm not that madly in love with our lovely ladies! I don't make that much dolls and bunch of pictures of ladies." said Danny.

"Yeah, but you do have some lewd photos of Alanna on your phone. Oh just think what she'll do to you if she found out."

"Wha-What!? How did you-nevermind! Just don't tell her!"

Quentin simply sighs and shook his head before he and the others heard a somewhat sinister laughter coming from their communications.

"Mwahaha! I see you boys made it here safely! My device works like a charm!" The scientist laughs with joy. "Right then, shall we begin?"

"That's what we're here for. Now hurry up.." said Orn.

"Alright alright, no need to be so grouchy...your first target of the day is quite interesting and creepy at the same time. Her name is Juvia Lockser, a water mage who reside here in a guild called Fairy Tail."

"Fairy Tail? What the heck is that?" Froze asked.

"I have acquired much data on Fairy Tail: It is known to be the strongest guild in the Kingdom of Fiore which we are located right now. The target, Juvia Lockser, was once in a dark guild called Phantom Lord, however, it was disbanded after the Fairy Tail defeated them. Sometime later, Juvia Lockser joins Fairy Tail." Alpha explains.

"Huh, interesting, but what's with all the Gray stuff here and there?"

"Juvia Lockser was defeated by the very same individual who she fell in love with: Gray Fullbuster."

"And she has been stalking him ever since, talk about unhealthy, mwahaha!" The doctor laughs again.

"Reminds me of a certain-"

"Shut up Dave! I don't stalk girls that much!"

"Right then, off you go, boys! Good luck killing her...you know, I was thinking of one of you guys getting a costume of Gray and tried to trick her an-"

"No way." Quentin sighs.

"Suit yourselves!" The scientist laughs before cutting off.

"Okay, so we're killing a woman who's madly in love with Gray...sounds cool, I guess." Skylar grins sheepishly." Though, I do feel bad for Gray, having her following him around saying 'I love you Gray-sama~!'"

"Yeah...thank goodness Vix is not like that..." Quentin said, wiping a sweat drop off. "Any other details about her?"

"Juvia Lockser is a water mage. She can turn her entire body into liquid, making it very hard to physically harm her."

"Should have brought Jackle with us, that'll be a win-win," said Dave.

"Don't forget, water hates Jackle. It'll fry the poor lad as well." said Dr. Zeal.

As the mercs continue their conversation, they were interrupted by a loud booming that was getting louder and louder. Before the mercs locate the sound, a large shadow covers them and they quickly look up to see a brown colored object heading coming down.. Froze was the first one to act as he dashes quickly to the safe spot with Orn following pursuit, Zark disappears into thin air and made it to the safe area before Froze and Orn has arrived, Quentin summons his dragon wings and glides towards the others, finally Alpha grabs the remaining mercs and activates his boosters to reach the other in just in the nick a time as the brown object slams down on their previous spot. All ten of the mercs made it safely and no one was hurt.

"W-Whew...thanks, Alpha," Skylar said as he breathing heavily and checking on Jet and Dash to see they are unharmed.

"Aye, For a moment there, I thought I was a goner," said Dr.Zeal.

"Too close in fact! Why didn't you warn us earlier!?" Dave shouted at the behemoth robot.

"Apologies, Master Dave. I was gathering data about her and this world. I failed to notice we were in danger." Alpha said. "But the target, Juvia Lockser, is here. She is above us."

The mercs have noticed another object right beside them which is similar to the object that almost crushes them and upon closer inspection, those two objects are actually dark brown boots. The mercs look up to see a blue dress coat and since they are nearly underneath it, they can see a pair of blue panties.

"Whoa! Panty shot!" Danny said drooling.

"Yep...very similar."

"Sh-Shut up!"

The mercs keep trailing the body, they can't get a good view of her face due to her 'mountains', but they did see a lock of blue hair resting on the cloth covered breasts.

"Can we climb this mountain of beauty!?" Danny asked Quentin, much to his annoyance.

"You just want to get a good view of her panties..."

"Sadly, we don't have any teleporters with us, but we do have Alpha." said Zeke. "He can turn into a hovercraft and can get us up there in no time."

"Or we can climb..." The womanizer drops to his knees, begging for the leader to pick climbing.

"It's his decision, laddie. What it'll be, Quentin?"

"Right then...I'll pick.."
114331.title: I'm Hunting in the Rain~

114332.content:
(The selected group: Quentin, Zeke, Viz, Danny, Slick, Zaviera, Shadow, Flare, Aradia, and Dave)



The selected NanoCorps emerges from the light, landed safely on a purple color landscape. The hunters notice the landscape they just landed felt quite leather...like a book or something. Speaking of books, they notice they are surrounded by bookshelves, full of books.

"Uhh...are we in a library?" said Danny.

"Not really, sort of." Flare pointed out there's a bed right near the bookcase. "I guess this is someone's bedroom...full of books. To have this many books must be either a genius or a freaky book collector."

"In a word: We are targeting a nerd...which is not my style." Viz said sighing in disappointment.

"Got that right. Nerds don't have a nice price on their heads, believe me, I tangle one back in the day...and it was rather disappointing," said Dave.

"Did you let him go?"

"Nope. I socked the bastard right between the eyes..plus he was getting on my nerves will all that whining and offer me some rare action figure instead of higher price."

"...You do realize if that was a very rare toy, you can pun it for a hefty price..." said Quentin.

"..And now I know..dammit."

Suddenly, their communication starts beeping and the voice of Dr.Micro appears with his annoying laughter. "Mwhahahaha! Nice to see you all here and well! Ready for your first day of the hunt?"

"Yep. Who's the gal?" Quentin asked the doc.

"Today's lucky target is Levy McGarden! But uhh...she's not here at the moment, hehe..." Dr. Micro laughs sheepishly.

"Hmm? Why is that?"

"Right now as we speaking, she's on a mission with her fellow guildmates, and by guildmates, I mean Fairy Tail - The strongest guild of magic users in the Kingdom of Fiore." Micro explains as Aradia is quite interested of these strongest mages. "According to my research, Levy here uses an interesting magic called Solid Script or Letter Magic that allows her to generate words in the air and make them solid...very unique indeed."

"Huh, that's intriguing...so, we wait here until Levy comes back and then we...kill her, correct?" the mage said.

"Bingo! She should come back at least...Hmm...5 to 20 minutes. Once she enters her room, strike her when you get the chance, luckily she is not one of the strongest magic users in Fairy Tail. However, due to your sizes, she'll mistake you all for tiny bugs and attempt to squish you. Honestly, I rather not see you all turn into nothing but guts..." The doctor laughs.

"That won't be a problem...we got miss big ogre here with us..." Slick yawns.

"Yep yep! Just leave it to me!" Zaviera grins.

"Ahh that's right, I completely forgot about the cutie ogre. Then you all should alright...well have fun, kids! Don't end up under her foot, mwahaha!" The doc laughs before cutting off. With that out of the way. the mercs must wait for their 'target' to enter and then strike at her.

"Alright, kids, you all know what the plan, right?" Zeke asked the group.

"Fool the doc by getting the blood from Levy and gain her trust and ask her to pretend to be dead.." said Viz.

"Bingo...although, the 'getting her blood' part would be impossible without our three robots."

"Guess we'll stick with the 'gain her trust' plan and come a way to fool-" Before Quentin can say anything else, they heard the doorknob rattle and begins to turn, opening the door. the mercs turn to the door to see if its Levy or possibly someone else...
114332.title: A Bookworm...It had to be a Bookworm...
