choices: Let the tour(and special mission) begin!
A mysterious woman appears in front of Chronoa
1151321.content:
(The selected group: Quentin, Zeke, Delta, Flare, Jackle, Rive, Orn, Ryx, Vixen, and Zark)




Before the selected group of NanoCorps arrive at their destination, in another universe, inside the sacred place known as Time Nest where it holds all of history from the past and a book that holds all the records in time...and currently a nest for the divine bird that creates time.

"Oooh, where's Trunks and those new group of Time Patrols he was supposed to bring!?" The Supreme Kai of Time, while her real is Chronoa, said while pacing around waiting for Trunks to return. The young and cute looking Kaioshin who happens to be 75 million years old, wearing a robe that most of the Kaioshin wears and a pair of Potara earrings, and high heeled boots for her short stature.

"Kiiiiii!" The yellow and white bird named Tokitoki calls out to the Kai while sitting on one of his perching spots which is in the middle of the pond. The bird is strangely resembled of a wise old man and is a best friend and pet of the Kai and a very important one for the Time Nest.

"I know, I know! But it has been 3 hours since he left and I haven't heard from him since!" The Kai huffs and being impatient.

"Tooooh! Kiiiii!" The bird caws again, this time it made the Kai stops in her tracks and gets angry.

"Shut up! I am being patient, but I'm worried about Trunks and the patrols..." The Kai sighs before resume her pacing. Just as the Kai about to contact Trunks once more, she suddenly sense a small yet faint presence near the stairways of the Time Storage Vault. She hurries over to where the presence is, noticing a tiny light floating near the stone walkway that is barely the size of a tiny incest.

"Huh..? What is that?" The Kai got on her knees to get a better look at the tiny light. At first, she thought it was a time crack from the rift, but this is way too small to be a rift. As the Kai moves in for a closer look, the light begins to bright up and popping from the light are a group of tiny people, which are the NanoCorps, landed on the stones. Her eyes widen in shock, letting a gasp, watching the tiny group move around a bit before noticing the Kai and they too were quite stunned.

"What the hell is that!?" Jackle shouted as he notices Chronoa's large face looming over them and prepares to charge up his electrical attack.

"Stand down, Jackle!" Quentin orders the renegade to halt the attack. "I don't think she's hostile..."

"Wow, I guess that crazy doctor's invention really...now I see how different it is from Richie's point of view." said Vixen.

The mercs and the Kai stare at each other for a few minutes before Chronoa calmly speaks to the group without scaring them.

"Hello there, do not be frighten...I'm a friendly giant, I guess...?" She smiles a bit, showing she means no harm to them...though she actually quite glad there are beings that are shorter than her.

"Kiiiii! Kiiiii!" Tokitoki squawks once more, ringing the mercs' ears.

"Not now, Tokitoki...." The Kai clutches her fist in anger before returning her attention to the NanoCorps. "Sorry about my friend Tokitoki, he's always like this. So, are you guys the new Time Patrol recruits that Trunks mention?"

"Time Patrols? What the hell is-" Jackle was about to say something but was covered by Zeke's giant mechanical hand.

"Yes, we are the new Time Patrol recruits you just heard about. Trunks told us to go ahead and meet you here without him, he had other things to do." Zeke lied to the Kai which is very rare for Zeke to lie and it seems working for them as she believes his words. "We decided to wrap over here but it looks like...it miscalculated."

"In a very small way, hehe" The Kai giggles at her joke, although the mercs didn't laugh at her joke except for Jackle who gets the joke. Clearing her throat, the Kai stands up to full height with her hands on her hips, towering over the tiny 'Time Patrols', craning their necks to see her face.

"Huh, I just realized she looks young. How old is she?" Rive whisperers to the group.

"She's 75,000,000 years old." said Delta, shocking the mercs except for Zeke.

"Beg your pardon?"

"Damn, she's much older than the old gran-" Jackle's mouth was silence as Zark quickly covers his mouth while he and the others nervously look at Flare if she heard it.

"...What?" Flare looks at them, confused.

"N-Nothing, Flare!" Vixen sighs before slapping Jackle across the head. "Idiot! You know saying anything that relates her age is taboo!"

"Son of the- that hurt...I didn't know about that!"

"Now you know...Delta, you sure about her age?"

"The Supreme Kai of Time is 75,000,000 years old and before you asked, my calculation hasn't proved wrong."

"And this is true, A.I. rarely miscalculated." said Ryx. "Anyway, you don't think she's our target?"

"Not sure. Micro hasn't called us yet, but right now, play along," said Quentin

"What are you guys talking about?" The Kai's booming voice startle some mercs who was quite curious about their conversation, hoping they are talking about how huge she is right now.

"N-Nothing, ma'am! Just talking about how awesome this Time Portal job gonna be and you look mighty fabulous I may add." Quentin said with a smile.

"Aww, how sweet! Now hop on to my hand and I'll show you around the Time Nest!" The Kai smiles before she lowers hand towards them. One by one, the mercs hop aboard her hand.

Chronoa couldn't help but giggle to herself while watching them get onto her hand. Miscalculated or not, she never encounters such small people before and for the first time, she enjoys having someone shorter than her. Once the mercs are secured, the Kai takes them to the Time Storage Vault for a little tour and might come up with a mission just for them....for her pleasure that is...
1151321.title: Wait, What? They're the New Time Patrollers?

1152.content: Right-o, who's the lucky lady?
1152.title: N.C.O. (NanoCorps Online)

choices: Lure Asuna out to the field
11521.content:
(Done by zikade, with a little editing.)



(The selected group: Quentin, Zeke, Petrie, Sharper, Ralph, Cross, Atomic, Delta, Revenant, and Veil)





As the selected NanoCorps emerge from the portal, they immediately notice the huge blades of grass all around them.

“What is this, some kinda jungle? Where did that whacky doctor send us this time?” groaned Sharper.

“Works for me. More hiding spots,” said Ralph, reaching for his sniper rifle on his back. Only… his fingers touched the wooden shaft of a spear.

“The hell...?” Petrie reaching for his own weapon, only to find out he's equipped with a dagger in each hand.

Quentin looked around at his teammates, noticing each member, minus Revenant, equipped with a bladed weapon and medieval-style armor instead of their customized guns and exo-suits. Only Atomic was unaffected, which meant little for him since he didn't need weapons or armor anyway. Looking around, he also noticed a green bar at the edge of his vision, right underneath his name. Zeke noted it looked the view through his high tech goggles, except his head was bare. Quentin could also see green bars next to his comrades, along with a green icon floating above their head. Except for Atomic, who had a black icon floating above his monstrous visage. Well, it will make keeping track of his fellow mercs a bit easier.

Just as he was getting used to this new perspective of the world, a flashing envelope icon floating into view. Quentin tapped it, and Van Micro's shadowy visage emerged.

“Mwahahaha! Welcome to Sword Art Online, my good friends!” the mad scientist said through the video channel.

“We aren't your friends and what the hell is going on here!?” Petrie yelled at the video window. “Where's our stuff? How are we supposed to fight anything with these kitchen knives?”

“Don't worry, your equipment is being sent back to your other members. You can reclaim it...that is, if you all alive." the doctor cackled.

“Enough...where did you send us? What's this Sword Art Online?” Cross interrupted.

“It's a popular online game, except you connect using your own cranium instead of a computer. But pay close attention to the name: guns aren't allowed in SWORD Art Online, obviously. You'll have to make due with those bladed weapons that I paid a lot of in-game currency for. Do you have any idea how long it took me to grind to get you that sword in your hands? So many skeletons-”

“Don't care. What's the target?”

“Ugh... of course. Well, if you die in this game, you die in real life. Scary, right? I put a regen skill on your equipment so you guys won't have to worry about it. But the daughter of a very important person is also trapped in this game, and some very powerful people want her taken out. So, all you have to do is defeat her here, and she'll never wake up over there! Of course, I'm getting paid handsomely-”

“Again. don't care. Where do we find her?” Cross demanded.

“Alright alright...impatient, aren't we? ” the doctor said, rubbing his chin. The mercs heard him hit a few keystrokes and a player's profile popped into each merc's view. A young girl's smiling face, framed by long brown hair. She was decked out in white and red armor, and a rapier hung sheathed at her hip. She was at a high level, with a lot of deadly skills. Quentin noticed her character name: Asuna.

“Whoa! What a cutie!” Sharper said.

“Glad the womanizer mortal isn't with us.., he'll jump all over her.” Veil moaned.

“Speaking of size…aren't we a bit small, or are those blades of grass just huge?” Zeke asked.

“Oh yeah! In order to transfer you guys into the game, I had to compress you really small! I wrote the algorithm myself, it's quite-”

“Don't care...though it could be a problem with some of us here.” Cross said while looking at the three recons.

"Wh-What's that suppose to mean?" Petrie grumbles.

"Just use your skills and everything will be fine, trust me! At any rate, I should disconnect before the game notices this outside connection. Good luck, NanoCorps!” the scientist laughs as the window closed out

Quentin turned to his gynoid companion Delta who has hacking capabilities that could come in handy in an online game like this.

“Delta, can you find this target?”

“Searching now, Master Quentin… target acquired. She's currently on this level, staying at an inn in a town close by,” the gynoid reported.

“Shame we don't have any teleporters. ” Ralph sighs.

Zeke examined his spear. “Taking down even the weakest monster will be a challenge at this size. Delta, can you perhaps hack the game to remove the target from the player list, so it will look as if she was killed?”

“It is possible, but only if the target was rendered unconscious first. The game's security layer is simply too secure otherwise.”

Quentin slammed his fist down into his open palm. “That's the plan, then. We ambush the target and render her unconscious, then we remove her character from the game's roster. Then we'll get the hell out of here,” the young leader said.

“Sounds good to me. What's the plan?” Petrie inquired.

“Well...”
11521.title: Tracking Down the Flash (Not from DC)

115212.content:
(Done by zikade, with a little editing.)



“Let's lure her to us. We have more than enough space to play with out here in this field,” Quentin said.

“Yeah…if we don't get eaten by a monster first,” Sharper whined.

“Delta, send a message to Asuna. Make it say that you're being attacked by a huge monster and you need help. Also, make it look like it was sent by some weakling player,” Quentin told his robotic comrade.

“Sending now,” Delta said, her hands quickly tapping out a message in the air.

“S-Seriously!? We're gonna fight a monster that is twice the size of us!?” Sharper gasped.

“Uhh..we do have a monster, kid. He's right beside us,” Zeke said, slapping Atomic on the leg.

“Hey, this 'monster' got feelings, ya know!” Atomic laughed.

“Alrighty, let's get started. Here what we gonna do...” the young Drangua ordered.



...Later in the day…




From their perch atop the highest tree branch, the three recon stooges and Veil were the first ones to see the target approaching. The young girl certainly didn't waste any time getting here. The target's long brown hair streamed behind her as she ran to the coordinates sent in the message. Sunlight glinted off her armor as she ran through the field at full steam.

“Huh...she must be quite the do-gooder to come running out here so quickly,” observed Ralph. “How revolting...”

“She's even cuter in person! What a goddess!” Sharper drooled.

Petrie knocked both of their heads together. “Stay quiet, ya dimwits and wait for the signal!” the older recon said while the angel simply sighs at their usual goof-ups.

Just like Ralph said, Asuna wasted no time coming to the rescue. She remembered how scared she was when she was a weak player, always afraid of death lurking right around the corner. She didn't think twice, quickly donning her armor and running to where the player said he was cornered by a monster. However, as she got closer, she couldn't believe her eyes. It looked like an action figure was fighting against a monster the size of a small dog. Still, the monster had a black icon hovering over its bulk, telling her this was a seriously strong monster. Even at her high level, there was still dangerous beasts roaming about. The player, who is Revenant, fighting the monster was fending off its attacks but looked like he was giving a bit of ground with each parry. But why was he so tiny? Was this a glitch in the system, or a new status effect? Also, he looked strange. Maybe a custom avatar? Whatever, she could ask him once she defeated the beast. The monster was terrifyingly muscular and demonic. Asuna would have to be on her toes to defeat this creature. She equipped her rapier and prepared to attack.

“Go easy, Atomic...” the undead knight said, just barely avoiding another one of his invincible comrade's swipes.

“Your blessed armor can take a punch, plus we gotta make it look realistic, so better keep up!” Atomic roared with a laugh. They both turned as they heard thundering footsteps approach. Their target came into view, sword in hand.

“Hey there! Don't worry, I'll defeat this monster in a jiffy!” Asuna said, getting into an attack stance.

“Ooh! She has the voice of an angel!” Sharper drooled. “Do we really have to do this?”

“Just follow orders, dammit!” Petrie said.

"...I seriously don't know how these mortals still remain in the group..." Veil thought to herself.

"Did you say something, Veil?"

"No, not at all."

“Linear!” Asuna shouted, as her body began to glow. Before anyone could blink, she lunged forward at an incredible speed, rapier pointed directly at Atomic. For anyone else, they would be impaled before they could even draw another breath. But Atomic's reflexes were unparalleled. From his view, the sword looked like the pointy end of a skyscraper was headed directly at him. His world exploded in pain as the sword entered his body, but just as quickly, his arms wrapped around the blade of the rapier. He planted his feet and kept the rapier stuck inside his body. He watched his own HP display dip briefly before his invincibility kicked in and his HP filled back up. Using his incredible strength, he wrenched the sword away from the giantess's grip. Shocked, the Lightning Flash began to stumble. She had never seen a monster parry an attack so with such speed!

“Gah...first time I felt pain before. Alright fellas, get to it because this hurts like hell!” Atomic roared.

“Go go go!” Quentin ordered. Asuna was so confused over being disarmed that she didn't even notice the three tiny recon stooges and Veil drop from the tree above her. Brandishing their weapons, the four jumped into Asuna's thick curtain of hair and plunge their swords, lance, and knives right between the target's shoulder blades. Their weight caused them to drag their weapons right down the giantess's back, and they landed on the ground right between her armored feet. Sharper began to look up Asuna's skirt before Petrie dragged him away before they could be stepped on.

Asuna doubled over in pain. The attack didn't do much damage, but she was now fighting multiple unknown enemies without a weapon. Quentin noticed the icons over the mercs' heads now turned orange. Asuna noticed this change as well and wondered why there are tiny player-killers running around. Is this a new trick by Laughing Coffin? Whatever the case, she had to defeat these PKers and warn other players. Tiny infiltrators would be a menace, for any guild.

As she opened her inventory menu to equip a backup sword, she failed to notice four more tiny mercs rush from the grass towards her feet. Before she could finish the equipment change, Zeke, Quentin, Cross, and Delta sliced into the giantess's ankle, causing another glowing red wound on her avatar. Asuna saw a dreaded icon appear under her HP display: a boot with a red line through it. Limited mobility means certain death, especially since she's alone. Her knees buckled under her as she toppled forward, but she caught her fall with her hands. She looked up to see the tiny Quentin, along with the others, drawn his blade out, ready to attack.

"Sorry, Asuna. I hate to do this...but orders are orders..."
115212.title: Luring Asuna

choices: Zeke came up with a plan
1152122.content:
(Done by zikade, with a little editing.)



The broadsword had just the right heft in Quentin’s hands as he prepared to strike the finishing blow. With his quarry down on her hands and knees, it didn’t feel much like a hunt. He remembered the heat from the Quantum Dragon’s belly as he sliced the creature in two during his first mission on the eighth moon around Regolith IV, along with Amber, Cross, and Viz. His skin crawled as he recalled the slimy flesh of the Plutonium Squid deep in the Endless Ocean on Europa that had taken out a whole platoon of the galaxy’s best bounty hunters and mercenaries before Quentin shoved a nuke through its maw. But this target, as huge as she was, was still a cute young girl. Under a dangling fringe of brown hair, her brown eyes still blazed with fire, calling to mind the old saying that a cornered animal is always the most dangerous. Oh well, he just wanted this job to be over with. His fellow mercs had done all the dirty work of disabling the target, and all that was left was for their fearless leader to knock her out. He flipped his blade over to its flat side, in order to deliver a powerful thwack.

The Drangua’s calf muscles bulged as he prepared to launch himself at Asuna. The ground cracked under his feet as he leaped skyward, toward’s Asuna’s heavenly face.

“Dragon Maw Strike!” he yelled, as Asuna’s face loomed in the sky above him, coming ever closer like a falling planetary body. “Asuna the Lightning Flash was it? I'll admit, I was kinda hoping to see you move that fast, like one of my comrades who aren't here, but you get the gest.” the Drangua said. “But I believe its checkmate for you...no hard feelings!” he shouted up at his quarry.

For her part, the brown-haired swordswoman was about to live up to her nickname. Shifting her weight to her left side, she reached out with her right hand, intending to intercept the tiny PKer in midair. Of course, with his extremely high reflexes, Quentin saw the hand coming from a mile away, fingers outstretched like talons. Quentin always had his handy dragon wings ready to pop out at a moment’s notice and needs them now than ever. He squeezed his back muscles, and before his wings could sprout out, a video message appeared before his eyes. Dr. Van Micro’s shadowy visage appeared in the window.

“Uhh...we're kinda in a middle of a battle here, doc.” Quentin sighs

“Oh, you are? Well just to let you know, flying has not been implemented in this game! If you want to soar through the skies, you’ll have to play this game’s successor. In fact-” the crazy scientist blathered before Quentin tapped the window closed with a groan. With no way to alter his trajectory, the Drangua was helpless to evade as Asuna’s hand grabbed him. He slammed into the skin of her palm hard enough to knock the wind out of him. Her slender fingers closed around him in a vice-like grip, crushing his lungs. His head and shoulders still poked out, however, and he quickly swung his sword around to sever the offending appendage. He still had the flat side of the sword facing her, however, and he silently cursed himself as the broadsword bounced off her wrist with a resounding thud.

Asuna winced in pain, but quickly pivoted her weight onto her left hand and kicked out with her uninjured leg in a sweep, sending the mercs gathered around her feet flying into the weeds. Sharper just happened to be ducking to retie his shoe, and he got a heavenly glimpse of Asuna’s panties in full view underneath her red skirt. Momentarily out of danger, the swordswoman collapsed down onto her butt, crushing Sharper underneath. The soft material of the giantess’s panties did nothing to cushion the blow, and Sharper’s HP quickly fell to 0 as her massive weight crushed him into the dirt. Because of the doc’s machinations, he still remained in the game, but his HP couldn’t recover while the giant girl’s rear remained on top of him. But in all his travels, there was nowhere he would rather be more, then under the rear of the girl who he just fell in love with.

"Ouch...Sharper just got crushed under Asuna's ass..." Ralph said with a smirk.

"Serves him right for being like Danny!" Petrie shouted.

Before Quentin could strike another blow, Asuna’s left hand hovered over his head and two slender fingers roughly pinched his wrists together, then plucked his sword from his grip and threw it away. Now disarmed as well, the Drangua looked in dismay at the icon of a sword with a slash through it right under his HP bar. Luckily. he wasn’t the only member of the group. Quentin looked around from his elevated view, but could only see Atomic still impaled by Asuna’s sword. That was a bit of a stalemate, as removing the sword from his body would allow Atomic full movement, but would give the swordswoman back her weapon, which might spell doom for them, now that she’s more familiar with their tactics. Certainly, Zeke was planning their next move, hidden in the tall grass with the rest of his fellow hunters. Except for Sharper, of course.

With little else to do, Quentin took stock of his captor. His heightened sense of smell was filled with the tangy bite of Asuna’s sweat, but he could also detect faint traces of vanilla. He met her piercing brown eyes with his own gaze. Long caramel-colored hair cascaded down around her flawless face. Her clothes were impeccably tailored and flattered her form. She almost reminds of Vixen, she has a fierce fighting spirit and never backing down, he was actually impressed of her spirit even backed into a corner by highly-skilled adversaries, she was still giving it everything she’s got. As someone who has had his share of scrapes with death, the Drangua knew that look in her eyes: the look of someone who would never give up...yes, she is definitely like Vixen.

“Listen up!” Asuna yelled, projecting her voice towards the hidden mercs. “Throw down your weapons and surrender, or...” she said, two fingers of her other hand reaching down and squeezing Quentin’s head. “ Or I’ll kill your leader!”

Despite the crushing cranial pressure, Quentin’s ears still worked well enough to hear peals of mocking laughter coming from the grass. “Go ahead, do it!” Petrie said. “He still hasn’t given us our pay from the last two mission!”

“Wait, what? I did give you a pay-wait a minute..." Quentin realized Petrie was actually joking, trying to give some tension so Zeke can figure out what to do next. "I see...uh, I’ve been meaning to! I just haven’t gotten around to balancing the checkbook yet!” Quentin shouted.

“He deserves it” mocked Ralph. “He always cooks the worst food too!”

“And he never wants to do the laundry!” said Atomic

“And he snores!” followed by Veil.

“Okay..that kinda hurts..." Quentin sighs. “Uhh...when this is all over, you’re all fired with no pay!”

The crushing pressure finally lets up as Asuna stopped pinching Quentin’s skull. “ Being a leader is tough, huh?” she said to him, knowingly.

“Ehh, kinda. They never want to wake up early, or do any recon on the target, or take out the trash...I mean, the trash cans are always full and never been taken out!” the leader, falsely, complained. He could tell immediately that Asuna was one of those born leaders, that people would follow to the very pits of hell. Just like himself. But this is no time to be making friends with his target! Quentin might’ve been new to this game, but he quickly figured out Asuna’s strategy: by stalling for time until her HP recovered and her ailments went away, she would be able to escape. If she hid somewhere or summoned help, this job would quickly become impossible. Quentin had never lost a target yet, but he’ll need his fellow mercs’ help more than usual on this job…
1152122.title: Asuna's Counterattack!

11521221.content:
“But still… it’s nice to have friends, isn’t it?” Asuna said, starting to bond with the tiny Drangua in her hand, starting to see he wasn’t the usual PKer scum and she felt a bit of a bond with him, as a fellow warrior.

"Heh, tried befriending all 60 of them, but I see what you mean." Quentin chuckles a bit.

"60!? That's a pretty large group! Are you and your friends in a guild?" Asuna said, noticing her HP had recovered and removing her movement disability,

"Uhh...yeah, we are in a guild...we created one not too long ago..." Quentin tries his best not to blabber out their mission, though this not a big concern to him. It's Asuna he's concern now she's fully recovered and stands. Sharper, who was pinned underneath Asuna, was finally able to move and rolled onto his back, only to be greeted with the sight of her white panties once more.

"Ahh...what a beautiful sight..." Sharper smiles with his nose gushing out blood.

"Idiot." Petrie facepalms.

Atomic, meanwhile, was barely hanging on to Asuna's sword, cursing up a storm from having so much pain."Son of a bitch! I can't take this crap! I'm not used to feeling pain!" The brute roared before pulling out the swords and toss it beside him. "Ahh, that's better...I'm not doing that shit again..."

Brushing off the debris from her skirt with her other hand and seeing the monster letting go her sword, Asuna, tightens her occupied grip so that Quentin won't fall off, made a surprising dash towards her rapier that neither Quentin and his team didn't notice and successfully obtain her weapon, but not before swiping Atomic with another Linear, able to push the brute back towards the others. Emerging from their hiding spot, the NanoCorps were about to attack her in order to rescue Quentin, Asuna made a quick announcement while pointing her rapier towards them, stopping them in their tracks.

"Do not come any closer or I'll cut down your leader!" Asuna threatens them and to back this, she holds her rapier near Quentin's head, though she really doesn't want to harm the tiny player. "Cooperate and he'll be unharmed. However, he's coming with me for a little...questioning."

"Tch. Like hell you would..." Cross said, beings out Dr.Micro's custom-made scythe to battle, but was stopped by Zeke as he gets in front of him. "Zeke?"

"...Will you be alright, kid?"

"Yeah, I'll be fine. Whatever you guys do: Do Not Attack Any Other Players. Monsters are okay, but not players. I might be back...depends on the situation." Quentin said with a nod, signaling the co-leader to stand down.

"Hmm...very well. All players stan down. Let her go."

"What!? After she cut me not once, but twice!?" Atomic roared in anger.

"Hold, you abomination. I do believe they have a plan..." said Veil.

Atomic growls at first, but decided to stand down along with the others. Asuna, sighs in relief and moves her sword away from the Drangua, safely sheathe her weapon for next battle, brought out a small, large to Quentin, glowing blue crystal out of her inventory.

"Teleport Granzam!" Asuna shouted and the crystal begins to glow brightly before disappearing into thin air, leaving the NanoCorps behind.

"Oooo, what are we gonna tell Vixen about this? She'll kill us!" Petrie whines as he rubbing his bald head.

"Calm down, kid. She just told us where they are headed: Granzam." said Zeke while checking on Atomic as he slowly recovering his wounds.

"Which is located on the 55th Floor." Delta said while tapping on the window screen. "We need a Teleport Crystal to reach 55th Floor. However, it seems the human know as Micro had forgotten to supply us with crystals and we must achieve them from shops."

"Curious, but what Floor are we on right now?" Revenant asked.

"...1st Floor where a settlement called Town of Beginnings resides."

"D'OH!!" Petrie, along with the other two, groans while facepalming. "It always had to be the first floor. It happens like every damn mission!"

"Let's head over to the town for now, kids. We may have to find an ally to help us out." said Zeke as he about head towards the entrance of the town with the other folllowed behind him.

"Ugh...should've brought Slick or Ella with us..." Sharper whines before Veil slaps him across the head.

"Quit your crying and get moving, mortal. I don't like it as well since there is no flying in this game, but we gotta deal with it and find a way to save Quentin."

"Yeah yeah...maybe they got something to snack on..." Sharper rubbing his stomach as it growls for food. He also worries about his boss's safety, who knows what she gonna do to him not after what just happen...he can only hope the Drangua can find a way to escape and reunite with the others...but right now, he got other things to worried about...like food as the tiny NanoCorps entering the town known as Town of Beginnings...
11521221.title: Mission Failed

choices: Bad news, Asuna is waking up!
11521222.content:
(Done by zikade, with a little editing.)




Sneaking through the grass, Zeke finally found Delta. The gynoid was calculating and typing with her personal computer, trying to think of a plan to save Quentin. However, Zeke had something in mind.

“Delta, can you hack into Asuna’s inventory?” the co-leader asked.

“Hacking now, Master Zeke.” Delta said, windows popping in and out of existence as she tried to hack into Asuna’s profile.

“What’re you thinking?” Petrie asked, coming up to the group. The rest of the mercs except Atomic followed closely behind him.

“Well, if we can add a poisonous item to the target’s inventory, we might be able to make her sick or a bomb would damage her...” Zeke contemplated, rubbing his chin.

“Displaying target’s inventory now,” Delta announced. Asuna’s armor and clothing were displayed in a window, along with her items.

“Hmm...what does this button do?” Ralph said, tapping at a random button at the bottom of the window. The button glowed, and all of Asuna’s equipment was now added to her inventory.

“Oh dear...the button Master Ralph just push have de-equip everything on the target,” Delta explained.

“Ooh…whoops,” Ralph laughs sheepishly as mercs glared at him.



...Meanwhile, back to Quentin and Asuna...




“But still… it’s nice to have friends, isn’t it?” Asuna said, starting to bond with the tiny Drangua in her hand. He wasn’t the usual PKer scum. She felt a bit of a bond with him, as a fellow warrior. However, she noticed that her HP had recovered enough to remove her movement disability. Finally, she could make tracks. Before she could move, however, her armor and clothes began to glow with a blue light… before disappearing entirely. The giantess was now as naked as the day she was born.

"Ooh sweet dragon's shit..." Quentin groans at the sight of Asuna's naked body, knowing someone screw up her inventory.

Gasping in embarrassment and rage, she balled her hands into fists. Unfortunately for one Drangua, however, he currently occupied one fist, and his eyeballs nearly popped out of his skull, both from the pressure and the incredible view in front of him. Asuna’s porcelain skin glistened in the sunlight, her hair covering her breasts.

“You bastards! What did you do?! You’re gonna pay for this!” Asuna roared, standing up. The pressure on him now released, Sharper rolled onto his back, only to be greeted with the greatest sight of his life: the backside of the girl he fell in love with, now completely bare.

"...Shit, should have brought my camera..."

Asuna was overcome with rage. First, they attack her like cowards, now they figured out a way to remove all her clothes. People or not, she wouldn’t stop until they were all dead. First one up, however, is their leader, still helpless in her hand. Brushing aside any thoughts of camaraderie she once had with the young Drangua.

"A-Asuna...let's not be hasty...that was an acci-"

His words cannot reach her ears as she opened her lips and raised Quentin to her mouth. The target’s once-angelic face was now creased with anger, as she brought him closer to her lips. How convenient, his head was the perfect size to fit between her teeth like a piece of candy. Quentin saw a strand of saliva break into droplets between the giantess’s pink lips as her hot breath washed over him. He could see her muscular tongue ready to strike like the Beast Anaconda from The Jungle Planet, the wettest, slimiest creature Quentin had ever faced. Until now, that is. The back of Asuna’s throat led to a deep abyss, but there would be no climbing out of that crevasse. Quentin’s head was placed on a glistening white tooth, as the giantess placed him into her mouth like a large lollipop. Except this lollipop had an extra-juicy center. The cavernous maw quickly darkened as Asuna’s lips closed. Her top row of teeth slammed down on Quentin’s neck, severing it. He watched his HP bar plunge to 0, but his vision never went completely dark. Looks like the crazy doc’s modifications made him unable to die even if decapitated. Still, it looks like he’ll be out of this fight.

A stream of digital blood dribbled down Asuna’s chin as she pulled Quentin’s headless torso out of her mouth with a grin. She tossed the body into the grass before wiping her chin with the back of her hand. “Looks like your boss lost his head...” she cackled. “But don’t worry. Soon you’ll join him!”

“HOLY STINKING DOG SHIT!!! She just tore off Quentin's head!” Petrie screams and watches the giant naked girl stomped toward them.

"Whoa...that was brutal..." said Ralph

“No kidding, dumbass! It's your fault for pressing that button!”

Oh right...my bad.” Ralph offered before Veil punched him hard enough to pound him into the dirt.

"I always knew one of you three mortals would make a mistake and now we're paying the price..."

Asuna’s fist crashed into the group, sending Ralph even further into the ground and sending the rest of the mercs flying through the air like shrapnel. They could barely stand up before the giantess sundered them again with her bare hands and feet.

“Why… won’t…. you… DIE!?!” she said through her teeth, unaware of the tiny hunter’s invulnerability. Still, she continued to stomp and punch them mercilessly. Despite their HP reaching 0 multiple times, each merc continued to stand up, only to be thrown into the air again.

“Okay...maybe being unable to die isn’t so great,” Cross grumbled, as Asuna squashed him flat under her sole for the umpteenth time. By now, bits of digital blood trickled down from between her toes.

Hearing the commotion, Atomic, still holding onto Asuna's weapon, looks over to see what's going on and was a bit of surprise seeing a giant naked girl stomping his comrades into oblivion. It was only when Ralph flew through the air and landed next to him that he decided to act. Seeing a large rock nearby, Atomic sprouts a tentacle from his back, grabbing the large rock and tossed it into Asuna’s head. The swordswoman’s eyes rolled backward and she fell onto her back, out cold.

Zeke was just recovering from being crushed in Asuna’s fist before her shadow fell over him. Expecting to see the dirty sole of her foot, he was inside surprised to see her toppling over like a fallen tree. He just managed to roll away as she collapsed onto the ground, throwing up clouds of dust. Brushing off his hat, he was delighted to see that Asuna’s eyes were tightly closed. They can feel safe, for a little while. Sharper had already climbed onto the giantess’s body and was currently spread eagle on her flat stomach, rising and falling with every breath. His eyes had hearts in them as he rubbed his cheek against Asuna’s milky-white skin. Atomic, who came up to the others, finally pulled the sword out of his body and threw it aside with a clang. “Damn...I’ll be feeling that one tomorrow,” he roared.

“I’m glad that’s over with,” Cross said, still upset about being crushed by Asuna.

“Agreed. But we’ve got one more problem to take care of,” Zeke said, gesturing towards Quentin’s headless body. “Someone has to retrieve Quentin's head from that girl before we can get out of here.”

“And who will get that thankless job?” Petrie asked, already knowing the answer.

“That'll be you and the other two, kid.. Get a move on.” ordered the co-leader.

“Eh, always the best jobs,” Ralph mumbled before being grabbed by Ralph and walking towards the fallen giantess’s head. They grabbed fistfuls of her soft brown hair, and began climbing up her scalp. When they arrived at her forehead, they paused to admire the view. Asuna’s nose rose gently upward before them, and her closed eyes were ringed by long eyelashes. The small hills of her breasts sloped downward into the plain of her stomach, and her long legs seemed to stretch to the horizon. They could see Sharper having the time of his life, rolling around like a child on Asuna’s tummy. As they approached the target’s lips, they were buffeted by a warm wind blowing from the giantess’s nostrils.

“Hey, this is messing up my hair,” complained Ralph.

“Not my problem, now get moving!”
11521222.title: Nice Plan...Not.

115212222.content:
(Done by zikade, with a little editing.)




The two recon stooges gently put their hands on Asuna’s plump lips and began to pry them apart, exposing her white teeth and a dark cavern beyond.

“Boss, you in here?” Ralph yelled into the organic cave.

“Idiot, his lungs are in his body, how would he be able to respond?” Petrie said, exasperated.

As Ralph got ready to descend, he hit his head off of an incisor. “Oww!”

“Hey Delta, can you make us a bit smaller?” Petrie shouted down at the robot.

“Changing avatar parameters… now,” Delta said. The two recon goons began shrinking until they were the size of one of Asuna’s ivory teeth.

“That’s too small...we’ll never be able to climb out now!” Ralph moaned.

“Not to worry!” Atomic roared, grabbing Asuna’s head and moving it to a more vertical position. “You can just walk inside now!”

“Geez, thanks,” Petrie said, climbing over the bottom lip and onto the tongue. The walls and floor were covered in shiny saliva, and the sharp teeth formed a sharp ring all around the tinier hunters. Asuna’s tongue squished under their feet as they looked around for Quentin’s noggin.

“Maybe she ate ‘im,” Ralph said, his voice echoing off the walls.

“Maybe not. Keep looking,” answered Petrie, climbing over Asuna’s molars and descending into the space between her gums and cheek. The humidity was overwhelming, and a drop of saliva splashed onto Petrie's head. He was just about to try lifting up the giantess’s tongue and checking underneath when he kicked something in the darkness. Something round. Petrie dislodged it from between Asuna’s back molars and her cheek, and the scaly texture told him it was Quentin’s separated head. The Drangua rolled his eyes at being stuck in his dark cavern for so long.

“I found the boss’s melon. Hey, what are you playing with?” Petrie inquired, noticing Ralph walking towards the back of Asuna’s throat.

“Look at this thing! It’s like a punching bag!” Ralph said, giving the dangling uvula a playful nudge. The fleshy ball bounced around.

“Haha! Hey, bet I can hit it with the boss’s head!” Petrie said, launching the head at the pink ball of flesh. The uvula slapped Quentin’s noggin right back at the bald hunter.

Ralph jumped onto the swinging uvula. “I feel just like Tarzan!” he laughed, swinging back and forth. “Hey, toss me the boss’s head! I wanna make a lay-up!”

Suddenly, a rumbling vibration came from deep within Asuna….
115212222.title: Exploring Asuna's Mouth

121.content:
Super Mario it is!

Now, who will the hunters be targeting?
121.title: It’s-a go time!

choices: ...Peach reaches down and grabs the hunters!
1211.content:
(Selected hunters: Quentin, Zeke, Beta, Atomic, Petire, Ralph, Sharper, Danny, Viz, Slick)

The Nanocorps emerge from the space-time portal and find themselves in a peaceful, grassy field. Only a few clouds float in the sunny sky, but something still seems...off. Everything looks huge! Or, are the hunters just small?

Before they can grasp their situation, the mercs find themselves looking right at a towering figure with blonde hair, a pink dress, a golden crown, blue eyes, and cute lips — Princess Peach! She must be out on an afternoon walk.

“Darn it...she must be a royal of some kind!” Viz says. “I guess the Doc forgot our code of conduct...”

“We have a code of conduct?” Sharper asks dumbly.

“Never assassinate royalty — no exceptions!” Quentin states matter-of-factly.

“What are we supposed to do, then?!” Petire whines.

Before the Nanocorps can do anything...
1211.title: Targeting the Mushroom Monarch

choices: Peach and the mercs made to Peach Castle
Peach bumps into the tomboy Daisy
12111.content:
Just as the Nanocorps prepare to either jump onto her shoe and scale or hide so they can come up with a plan, Peach was able to spot them! The tiny mercs have no time to run and are snatched up by her gloved hand, brought to eye level where they can see her blue colored eye, enough for Danny to swoon to her.

"Oh my! Tiny people? Are you alright? How did you all get here?" asks Peach.

"Well, it's not like we are here to-- " begins Sharper, before being interrupted by a slap from Petrie.

"Hmm?"

"Err, nevermind him...we just suddenly arrived here and we are kinda lost..." Quentin said, not revealing why they are really here.

"Oh, you poor dears! Let me take care of you till then. Perhaps a nice hot meal to fill you up?" the princess said with a smile.

"Sounds wonderful, my beloved beauty!" Danny swoons again before Petrie knocks him on the head.

"I'm surrounded by nitwits..."

Giggling at their interactions, Peach gently loves her hand near her chest level, getting a good view of her rather pink colored bust, and walks down the grassy field, heading to her castle.
12111.title: Peach meets the NanoCorps

121111.content:
After a good while of walking, Peach and the tiny mercs finally arrive at the Mushroom Kingdom castle. Making her way through the doors and into the royal kitchen, the Princess sets the Nanocorps down on the counter.

“So, how about some soup to warm you little ones up?” Peach asks.

“Sounds good!” Quentin replies.

Smiling, Peach fetches some veggies and sauce from the fridge before starting on that soup she promised. The hunters, meanwhile...

“Wow, that smells delicious!” Ralph says, unable to resist the scent of the soup being prepared.

Petire grabs at Ralph to prevent him from getting boiled in his attempt to grab an early lunch, which soon leads to all ten mercs entering a dust-cloud brawl where some hunters are trying to prevent the rest from being deep-fried. This brawl ends with the tiny team crash-landing right in the center of an empty bowl. And, of course, Peach has no idea all this is even happening!

Upon ensuring that the soup is cooked just right, the giantess monarch pours it into an empty bowl - submerging the Nanocorps in the broth. She then takes a seat at the table, scoops up a spoonful of soup, opens her mouth wide, and...
121111.title: Today’s Special: Nanocorps Soup!

choices: Peach tries to get them out
1211111.content:
As they are getting closer to her mouth and tried their best to alert the princess, the spoon carrying broth enters her mouth along with the mercs before closing her mouth behind them. Enjoying the flavor of the broth, Peach swishes the food, along with the mercs, around inside her mouth, tasting every detail of it. Her tongue's swaying increases in intensity, thrusting the poor mercs all about their moist prison and after a few seconds of this dreadful ride, the princess finally swallows both broth and NanoCorps into the dark chasm of her throat.

"Oh my, that was delicious!" The princess chirps with excitement. "Wouldn't you agree, little ones?" Peach asks the mercs but there was no response. Peach looks at the table, noticing the tiny people have simply vanished...she quickly looks under the table to find them, but they are not there. She knows they were right there before she went to get some veggies and sauce for the broth...unless...

"...Oh dear..." Peach's face turns pale while placing her hand on her belly, realizing that she must have eaten them by accident!

Meanwhile, the mercs fall for seconds that seem like hours, until they crash-land with a wet plop in a larger, hotter, wetter chamber known as Peach's stomach.

"No need to panic, guys," assures Quentin as he gets up. "We can get out of anything."

"Too late." Petrie pointed at Sharper frantically runs around in a circle, screaming in terror

"Alright, kid. Calm down," says Zeke, "Quentin's right. We can get out of here with our lives intact..."

As the group brainstorms ways to escape Peach's digestive system...
1211111.title: Peach's Inside Story

choices: ...she tries to help them out somehow.
...she smiles and messes around with them!
12111111.content:
Unfortunately for the Nanocorps, the acids of Peach's stomach start to rise, bubbling and eating away at the mercs' bodies. The tiny hunters do receive the mercy of blacking out before the juices can really become painful, though.

Eventually, the hunters slowly awaken to the sound of the Princess sobbing softly. They try to move but can't as Peach seems to rub them gently. Quentin quickly realizes the truth: he and his team must've been digested and absorbed into Princess Peach's abdominal muscles! In a frantic attempt to get her attention, they do their best to squirm around, only causing tiny goosbump-like twinges in the skin of her belly.

Peach stops sobbing for a moment, feeling the most unusual series of twitches in her midsection as she keeps a hand on it.

"Little ones..?" The Princess asks. "Are you still in there?"

"Y-yes..." Quentin replies through telepathy -- his only means of communication without a mouth. "I think we've been digested and absorbed into your abs."

Princess Peach blankly stares down at her abdomen for a good minute, trying to take in the fact that the tiny people she'd swallowed are part of her body now. Once it all starts to sink in...
12111111.title: Trapped Within Peach's Abs

12133.title: More choice and a different set

122.content:
Ahh, Hyrule, so many adventures and dangers across the corners!
Now then...who's shall be the 'target'?
122.title: Triforce! Away!

choices: They made it to the castle without incident
1221.content:
(The selected group: Quentin, Zeke, Cross, Ryx, Viz, Froze, Orn, Sumiye, Apollonia, and Aradia)



Hyrule Field...A beautiful serene with delicate flowers blooming through the field, a gentle breeze blew through the trees, the reflection of the lake shinned by the sun's light, and a lovely view of the Hyrule Castle where a beautiful princess name Zelda resides. A nice way to have a little picnic for the people in Hyrule...that is until an evil army name the Dark Forces, appears and causing havoc across the Hyrule, led by a dragon knight, an evil wizard, and a dark sorceress. Soldiers on both sides clash against each other, spewing blood across the field, but it seems the Dark Forces are gaining the upper hand...it looks bleak for the Hyrulean Forces, but little did they know, a group of hunters is about to enter the battle...

On top of the rocky cliff, a bright portal appears in thin air and coming out from it are the NanoCorps...although only the female members; Sumiye, Apollonia, and Aradia, came out with no sign of the guys and to make it very strange of their arrival...they appear to be normal sized. The girls check their bodies for any changes, but it seems they are okay, though it doesn't explain how they are still regular size, but more importantly...where are the boys?

"Ugh...Apollonia does not like any technology. She rather travels by land and, maybe, air." Apollonia, the foreign member who is not really a big fan of techs, lets out a huff.

"Heh, you'll get used to it eventually." Sumiye pats the warrior's head. "It looks like the doc's invention works, sort of. We're still at our normal height....could this be your doing, Aradia?" The girls turn to the sorceress who is well known for her size-changing spell.

"I would lie if I said I did but, of course, I didn't. Seems the invention did work half-way and the boys are missing," said Aradia before hearing loud shouting and sound of clashing swords over the cliff. "Hmm? What's all the ruckus?"

The girls walk over to the edge, witnessing soldiers and monsters battling each other with casualties on both sides.

"Ooh! A battle! Let us join them!" The warrior said while bringing her bow out.

"Whoa whoa whoa! You can't just go down there and pick a fight with them!" Sumiye grabs Apollonia's arm, preventing her to enter the battle. "We gotta find and regroup Quentin and the other before we can do anything."

"An excellent idea. The guys shouldn't be too far from here...let's find a way to sneak past them and-hmm?" The sorceress felt something near her foot and looks down, spotting 7 tiny figures near her.

"What is it?"

"Hmm...Just bugs but..."

"Hell magic lady scared of bugs? Apollonia takes care of them." Apollonia walks over to where the bugs are, lifting her foot up, ready to crush the insects and get on with the mission. Aradia carefully watches the bugs jumping around as if they are trying to contact her...her eye catches a small red line of light heading up, then forms what appears to be...a dragon's head...

"Wait...dragon's head...?" The sorceress' eyes widen as she remembers there is one person who can create a red colored dragon's head. "Apollonia! Stop!!"

"Huh? You don't want Apollonia crush bugs?"

"They're not bugs! It's the guys!"

"What!?"

The girls crouch down to get a better view on these 'insects' and let out a gasp as they spotted their fellow members waving their arms, shrunken down to a mere ant size. Aradia lowers her hand for them to climb on which they quickly did and lifts them up to the face level.

"Guys!? You're small!" Sumiye said, covering her mouth in surprise.

"No shit, Captain Obvious." Viz huffs in annoyance.

"Tiny metal arm man sound angry...She is sorry for almost crushing you." Apollonia lowers her head in shame.

"It's alright, kid. We didn't expect this to happen...then again, it could someone's dirty magic work..." Zeke said, assuming it was Adaria's magic that causes the guys to be shrunken.

"Again, it wasn't me... besides, if I wanted to shrink you guys, I would've done it looooong ago~"

"...And she's right, she would shrink us down in a snap." Quentin sighs. "We'll talk about this later, right now we gotta move. With this war going on and if spread over here, we will end up entering the fray."

"She doesn't mind at all." The warrior brought her bow out once more before being bonk on the head by Sumiye.

"While, yes, we have an almighty powerful mage, a policewoman with Atomic's powers, and an expert huntress on our side, we still don't know who's the enemy and who's an ally," said Zeke.

"Perhaps our best choice is to go to that castle over there." Froze, who is on top of Aradia's digit, pointing at a large castle over by the lake. "If there's a castle, there will be a king or queen."

"If there's a queen or princess reside there...a good chance that she might be Micro's target, which is not good cause of the 'No Royalty Killing' rule," said Cross while hearing the voices from the battlefield are getting louder and more intense "Also...it seems the fighting is getting closer to us."

"We must act swiftly..." said Ryx.

"Wait! We need to hide you guys before we move...too bad my skirt doesn't have pockets," said Sumiye.

"Not to worry. I have the perfect hiding spot just for you guys..." Aradia smiles before moving her head above her exposed cleavage, much to the members, especially the males, shock.

"Hey hey! What the hell are you doing!?" Viz shouted with his cheeks all red.

"Don't you dare put us in there!" Orn protest as well.

Aradia, ignoring the protests, tilts her hand and all of the 7 members free falling towards her cleavage. With them smushed between her large breasts, the sorceress gently pats her breasts before turning to her fellow members.

"All set! Let's go!" Araida walks in the opposite direction, leaving both Sumiye and Apollonia in awe.

"...Well uhh...th-that was...interesting..."

"At least pervy man is not with us," Apollonia said before following Aradia.

Sumiye sighs with a nod, knowing that Danny will have the time of his life if he was with them. The three mercs begin their journey to the castle without getting themselves into the fray...
1221.title: Battle Between Good & Evil...and a Small Problem

1222.content:
(In this mission's selected group: Quentin, Zeke, X, Danny, Rive, Ton, Raven, Delta, Amber, and Michiko)



Quentin, Zeke, and the selected members had made through the portal into different surroundings. The group notices the ground is a bit light blue and quite squishy and wet, even the two large mountains beyond them is blue.

"Wow, looks like that crazy doc's invention works. " Danny said with a grin. "But where are we?"

"Worry not, Master Danny. I have picked up a data when traveling through the portal. It appears we are under Lake Hylia, the largest body of water in Hyrule." said Delta

"Oh cool, at least we know where we-wait what!?"

"Again, worry not. We are inside someone's chamber in the Domain of Zoras, a group of aquatic, blue-skinned humanoid creatures resides here in Hyrule."

"Oh good...I thought we were underwater and the thought of being drowned is not something I look forward to."

"I do." Raven grins at Danny.

"R-Raven!? How cruel of you!" Danny said before swoons over to the Arachne. "But I'll forgive if you give me a kiss~!"

"Not in your life." The Arachne pushes Danny with one of her legs while folded her arms.

"Enough with the chit-chat. Where's our target?" X said, eager to get this mission done.

"Good question..." Quentin looks over at the strange blue mountains once more...it looks very familiar to him...almost too familiar...

"Oh good! I see you have arrived at your destination!" Dr. Micro's voice emerges from the group's communication. "Oh? I see only 10 of you? Did my invention goof up?"

"No. We decided to do a 10-man squad instead. Better safe than sorry."

"Ahh...well then, shall we get down to business? Your first target of the day is really good one! Her name is Ruto, Princess of the Zoras and, spoiler alerts, one of Seven Sages here in Hyrule! Oooh doesn't that sound good!?" The doctor laughs with joy.

"Wait a minute...Aren't we suppose to not kill-" Rive was completely silent when Ton, the silent but strong Dark Tonberry, covers her mouth with his little hands.

"Uhh yeah, sounds exciting..." Raven said with a fake grin.

"Isn't it!? Well then, I'll leave it to you NanoCorps to find and kill the princess. Don't care how it's done, I just wanna see her lovely corpse~! Farewell, mwahahahaha!" The doctor laughs before cutting the communication off

"Princess...It has to be a princess." Quentin groans.

"Tch. What a waste of time...let's just hurry and 'kill' the princess" said X

"I know, I know...Delta, have you locate Princess Ruto?"

"Yes, Master Andross. We are currently on the princess who is currently sleeping." Delta then turns to point at the mountains. "Based on our location, we are on top of her stomach region and the two objects over yonder that appears to be mountains are actually her breasts.

"Whoa whoa whoa! That's her breasts!? Hot Damn! That doc's device really works and very, VERY close to a woman's lovely, soft, bouncing mammaries-" Danny felt a punch to his stomach, causing him to get on his knees in pain. Rive, who punched him, standing in front of him, sighs at his perverted actions.

"...Why did we bring him along?"

"Recon...and I can see why he's not a good choice...but we gotta deal with it, kid." said Zeke. "Right now, why don't we head up to her head and discuss a plan on how to fool Dr.Micro without actually killing the princess."

"Sounds good. Question is...how do we get up there? We can trek across her body...of course, that's pervert's paradise for Danny." Quentin glares at Danny who gives a thumbs up.

"Damn skippy it does!" Danny grins at the idea before Rive bonks him on the head.

"I can teleport everyone to the top." X chimes in. "I suggest that one, but it's your call, boss."

"Right. Then we gonna choose..."
1222.title: Under the Sea and on the Princess

choices: Ruto felt it and wakes up
12222.content:
"Sorry, Danny, but we're gonna choose X's idea. It'll be quicker than just walking."

"Aww...So much for my plans to conquer Mount Blue Booby..." Danny sighs.

"Alright, X. Do your stuff."

The hedgehog nodded before his crystals begin to glow, snaps his fingers and a portal, known as Chaos Wrap, emerges in thin air. The portal is very colorful than the portal they came out from.

"Let's go," X said before jumping into the portal with the other members follow pursuit...though Danny tries to sneak past the portal so he can climb Ruto's boobs but was suddenly webbed up by Raven, dragging him to the portal and enter it.

The mercs emerge from the portal, having safely landed at their destination spot: Ruto's face. Curious at their new location, Amber check to see what part of her face they are on and It didn't take long when she spotted a blue mountain which is her nose. As the Majin move closer to the nose, she can hear her breathing and it's pretty loud to her.

"Wow! She snores louder than Atomic's!" Amber shouted.

"Don't get too close or you'll get suck in!" Quentin warns her before turning to Zeke. "Ok, Zeke, what's the plan?"

"Simply, kid, we drain her blood" Zeke said.

"Drain her blood? That's it?" said Rive. "I doubt that weirdo will be fooled that easily...":

"It won't hurt till we try. Of course...if we can't fool him, there's always a 'shakedown'."

"My kind of idea." Raven grins.

"Not a bad idea." Danny said. "But did the crazy doc also said send another proof that we kill her?"

"I notice something before we enter the portal. On her ears-err, 'fins', there's a pair of purple earrings. If we steal one of them, we will get enough trust from the doc." said Michiko

"Stealing her earring while she's asleep? Not my style for the ladies." Danny chuckles

"Your style is to flirt and grope women..." The female Saiyan rolls her eyes in annoyance.

"Heh heh...uhh, a-anyway, the only downside is...well, we're really small. How we gonna carry it?"

"Well...I'm strong enough to carry it, I mean, I am a Drangua." said Quentin. "And there's Rive, Amber, and Delta."

"Sweet! Let's get to work-wait a minute, how are we gonna suck up her blood?"

"I am capable of it, Master Danny." Delta morphs her hand into a large needle with a small tube attached to the arm. "Before I proceed, I must warn you all that there will be a 50/50 chance that she will wake up feeling the pain or what you humans call it a 'bug bite', and will commence an assault against us."

"We'll be ready when the time comes, begin the sucking."

"Affirmative "

With the command had been issued, Delta thrust down against Ruto's blue skin and begins draining her blood into the tube which will take up to one minute or more. Of course, there is a good chance Ruto will wake to feel the pain and will try to squash the mercs if that happens..

(Done by SuperKirby, with a little editing.)


"Oww..." utters Ruto quietly and groggily as she wakes from her slumber. "Wha...huh?"

As the giantess opens her mouth to say these words, Delta suddenly begins to lose her balance on her face.

"Oh dear. It seems the activity of collecting her blood has woken her. Move to safety as soon as possible." Delta warns the others, unable to keep her needle arm poking into Ruto's flesh. "Warning. She is about to wake up, we must -- "

That is all the other mercs hear before Delta ends up slipping and finally falling into the open mouth, which quickly closes as Ruto unknowingly traps a tiny robot being inside her.

"Oh dear..." says Quentin.

"Uhh...should we worry about Delta or ourselves?" said Rive, worrying about Delta being swallowed by the princess.

"A bit of both." said X, who doesn't seem a bit worry.
122221.title: Ruto's Awakening and Delta's Downfall

1222212.content:
"Okay..this isn't going well..." Rive sighs while the others felt the blue ground rumble as Ruto gets up from a weird pain she felt which made the mercs get on top of her nose.

"How do we rescue our friend?" said Michiko

"I can use Chaos Warp to get Delta out of there, eaten or not. However, I don't believe I can't do that." said X.

"And why not, spikey head?" Danny said while patting the hedgehog's head.

"...First of all...do NOT call me 'spikey head'...and second, she already spotted us..."

"Aww sorry, didn't mean to offend-wait, what!?" The NanoCorps, except for Zeke since he already looking at the other direction, turn around, only to see a massive view of Ruto's purple eyes looking down at the mercs and is quite upset about her rude awakening.

"Wh-What the...!? Who are you and how dare you wake me in my slumber!?" Ruto yells at the tiny mercs, covering their ears due to her loud god-like voice.

"Damn! She sure does have a loud voice!" said Danny "But she still looks cute! Hey, darling wanna go on a date!?"

"Seriously, Danny..." Rive sighs annoying while slapping him on the head.

"Ugh...forgive our uhh...intrusions. We are the NanoCorps, we come from the...future. We enter your dimension by mistake and try to wake you up for your assistance" Quentin lies his way through and, of course, he's not the type to lie about, maybe for not telling that they are here to 'kill' her is somewhat a good thing, if she believes it.

"NanoCorps? Future...?" Ruto said, still confused. "How did you get so small? Are you from a small race?"

"Sure, kid. Our race is very tiny, tiny enough that other races don't see us. But more importantly...we are deeply sorry for waking you up. Is there anything we can make it up for you?" said Zeke, much to the other mercs' shock. Ruto lets out amusing 'hmm', thinking of what she could do to them...

"I may have a proposal just for you, tiny people, it'll be most pleasing to have company unlike my beloved 'husband' who haven't visit me for weeks...But since you all have arrived in my chamber, you people will make up for my 'husband's' place." Ruto giggles with glee before scooping up the NanoCorps with her hand and opens up so they are in the palm of her hand, to them, it was vast of blue landscape with her towering digits acting as its guardians.

"...Zeke...I know you are called the 'wise gunman', but I'm not sure this is a wise decision." X sighs and facepalms himself.

"Trust me, kid. This will work...and have enough time for Delta to escape."

"I hope so...I really don't want to rub her feet..." Quentin groans.

12232.title: Guardians of Time

122322.content:
(The selected group: Quentin, Zeke, Viz, Cross, Hadaron, Atomic, Jackle, Shadow, Rive, and Ethelinda.)



The selected NanoCorps' members have arrived at their destination as the group emerges from the portal and landed safely on the tiled floor, with no weird changes on their bodies. The mercs scanned the dark surrounding room and notice many portraits of a man with blonde hair and a statue of the same man. It appears they are in somebody's room or chamber with a huge crush on this man. But before they could do anything else, their communication starts to beep and a rather chuckling voice appears which happen to be their contractor, Dr. Micro.

"Mwhahaha! Welcome to your new destination, NanoCorps! I see you are traveling...quite light, but no matter! You are here, that's good enough for me!" the scientist laughs with glee. "Now then, you all see these interesting 'decorations', no?"

"It's uh...rather interesting?" Rive said while staring one of the portraits. "Is she...like a hug fan of him?"

"You could say that, but she does have strange feelings for this young man. " The scientist explains. "Well then, let give a rundown on this target or rather a quick story about her...and what happen that cause her to be evil."

"Sweet! Story-time!" Atomic laughs.

"Hmph, count me out." Hadaron, the giant Abyss Drangua and one of the Big 6, wasn't too interested in the story and turns to the opposite direction.

"Oh don't mind him, he just grumpy. You may begin, Dr.Micro." Ethelinda, the giant Silver Drangua and one of the Big 6, said a smile.

"Oh, how nice of you! Alright then...I'll skip this part...here we go! In the land that is called Hyrule, which you guys are in now, there was once a powerful sorceress that has watches over the balance of the Triforce which you don't need to know about that one." The doctor said with another laugh.

"Anyway, as she sees through ages and times, there is but one unique soul that caught her attention...a soul of the Hero of the Legend that has reborn when Hyrule needs the best to fight evil. Of course, she wanted the Hero of the Legend, but sadly he's already bound to another soul...She was quite saddened by this and a single tear appears on her face..."

"Tch, how romantic..." Jackle does a fake gag.

"Oh come now, Jackle. This sorceress has feelings for the hero." said Quentin.

"Yeah right! She just wants him cause he's good lookin' and strong! Hell, even I can get the ladies just by flexing my muscles."

"Yeah...I highly doubt it cause no women wants an idiotic brat who boosted his strength and has a weakness with water. I should tell every woman to throw a cup of water at you before dumping you." Viz said with a smirk on his face.

"Fuck you, Viz!" The renegade got close to him, ready to duke it out.

"Knock it off...What happens next." Quentin asked the scientist.

"Let see...while the beautiful sorceress was preoccupied, something changes her, something very evil. This evil presence has managed to enter her heart and pushed the light away, changing her once curiosity...into an evil desperate desire who only wanted the Hero of the Legend's soul herself and the Triforce, and the rest of the story is blank. This is as far as I can tell. "

"Interesting..I'm curious what 'evil' presence that causes her to become evil," said Zeke.

"And what plans the evil one has in store? Perhaps taking over Hyrule?" said Shadow.

"Perhaps, but, unfortunately, that's none of our concern. The target should be around here in the Temple of Souls, which you all are on now and her name is Cia, by the way. Now be very careful, this is one evil sorceress you gotta watch out or you'll end up as her slaves...Ooh, I don't want that to happen, mwhahahaha! Good luck, NanoCorps!" Dr. Micro laughs before cutting off.

"Got all that, Hadaron?" said Cross

"Yeah yeah..."

"Where should we start? At this size, the place is massive and gonna be difficult to find Cia..so what's the plan, Quentin?" Viz asked the leader but notice he was looking at other direction. "Yo, Q! Did you hear me?"

"Yeah, I hear you...but I think our search has ended cause...we are being watched," Quentin said calmly.

"What? That bitch is already here!?" Jackle looks around, already spark up his hands.

"Hmph...I thought I felt something strange. She is definitely here." Hadaron said, looking over his shoulders. As the mercs look around the entire room, hoping to prevent any ambush attacks, they were startled by feminine laughter, echoing throughout the room.

"Oh, goodie...she's here." Rive groans.

"Show yourself, evil witch! Come out and fight like a.man!" Jackle threatens the mysterious voice. While the mercs trying to locate the voice, Shadow detected an evil presence from above them.

"She's above us! Move out of the-" It was the last words the ninja said before they were cover in darkness and for some reason, flesh. A few minutes later, the NanoCorps' members regain their sights and got a nice view of a purple eye with a menacing stare...they realize it was the evil sorceress Cia, the target they were looking for, who actually caught them instead! Now standing on the fleshy landscape which is her palm, they got a good view of the giant sorceress. Cia is quite a beautiful woman as she wearing a rather revealing dress that matches her personality.

"Tch, so this is the evil bitch we are looking for!" Jackle shouted.

"Whoa dude...don't say that to her, I mean, I think I saw her eyebrow twitch." said Rive.

"I agree."Quentin sighs before steps forward to confront Cia. "The name's Quentin Andross and we are the NanoCorps. I do believe you already heard of our conversations and our mission?"

"Of course. Who else wonder into my territory without invitation?" Cia's voice booms across the mercs' ears before making a smile on her face...a rather ominous smile to them. "So you are here to kill me? Very bold of you..or rather stupid despite our size difference."

"Well then kid, why didn't you try to kill us earlier?" said Zeke.

"My...no one ever calls me a kid before...this is the first," Cia begins to laugh, booming once more to their ears. "If you must know, I was very curious about your forms and species when you all emerge from the portal...At first, I thought that Princess sent you here to kill me, but it seems I wrong...it was this Micro man that sent you here. Perhaps...If I can make you change your minds, perhaps you can join me? I can grant you handsome rewards."

"Hmph. You think we're that dumb enough to join your cause? You must dumber than you look." Hadaron said, folding his arms.

"Really? Are you refusing my offer despite the current position you all in?" Cia glare down at them, giving them a menacing stare, but it doesn't effect on these mercs.

"Sorry, ugly hag! Orders are orders, get ready for a beat down, bitch!"

"Jackle..."

"What? She's asking for it!"

"Well that's too bad...and I started to like you, little ones...but you are just like the rest of them." Cia summons her specter from other hand and brought it close to the tiny NanoCorps. "You are all nothing but INSECTS!!"

"And this is what happens when you called every woman a bitch and ugly hag, Jackle. They will kill you, badly." Quentin sighs before brought out his small sword."Right then, time to do our job!"

"So we are gonna kill her?" Ethelinda asked.

"We'll see how it goes...if she is way too chaotic for mankind, then we may have to kill her. Alright, let's roll, NanoCorps."

With an order given out, the 10-man team get out their equipment, ready themselves to face off against the evil sorceress Cia. Who knows what powers she has in store and what evil schemes she intended to do in Hyrule, the NanoCorps must stop her before it is too late...
122322.title: The Wicked Evil Sorceress Cia

With weapons and magic on both sides are up, the mercs and the witch Cia are about to fight each other. With no time to waste, Viz made his first move by running towards the edge of her hand and jumps off while activating his stealth mode. Spotted this move, Cia powers up her specter to unleash her dark magic against them, though a certain assassin had made his move before her.

“Spread out and keep attacking? Got it. Rive, you're with me” said Shadow while headed towards Cia's chest with Lunar, sighing, follow pursuit.

"Alright! Time to spread some chaos! Later, losers!" Jackle laughs out loud before taking to the air.

"That boy needs to be taught a lesson...hrmph, I'm off." The giant Drangua takes off in the air before hearing his fellow giant Drangua words.

"Be careful, 'honey'!" Ethelinda waves at him with a smile.

"...I'll go help Viz." The blood Drangua said before flies towards the witch's face.

"Right then, I'll stay here and watch for any dangers..." said Zeke, getting his trusty sniper rifle, Ol' Besty, out.

"I guess its just you and me, Quentin. I do get rather lonely when I go doing an assignment..." The silver Drangua grabs her godson, cuddling him against her bosom.

"Ugh...fine, let's keep her wand at bay." Quentin groans while tries to push away the large breasts of the giant Drangua.

"Sounds good to me. Good luck, Zeke!" Ethelinda waves at her leader, still clutching her favorite Drangua before flies off.

"Heh...clingy as always..."

As the mercs carry out their plans, Cia saw the tiny mercs spreading out and gets really upset about this and with Viz kept attacking her, Cia has had enough of this.

"You damn bugs! Do you have any idea who you’re dealing with!? I’ll make you all suffer!"

With no time to wonder about their situation, the hunters retreat under the neatly-made bed as a young-looking giantess enters the room -- peeking out from under the bed, the Nanocorps are able to notice her light hair with purple streaks, her purple eyes, her black heeled boots, and her black-and-white outfit. Exhausted from a day of healing injured allies, she sets her staff down near a wall and sits upon the bed with a tired sigh.

Corrin, on the hand, was taking a break from the battle against Vallites with her royal siblings from both Nohr and Hoshido, along with their retainers. The thought of seeing her siblings together make the princess smile…though the peaceful thought was interrupt when something flying near her face. Corrin spotted not one, but two tiny flying figures in front of her and they move quite strangely…Corrin simply shrugs and gently blows the ‘bugs’ away.

Quentin and Cross felt a hurricane like wind hitting them as the giant girl tries to blow them away, luckily their dragon wings can withstand such powerful gust like this one and they remain close to Corrin’s face.

Noticing the danger, the tiny Dranguas quickly flies forward as the two gigantic hands closing in on them fast. The wall of flesh nearly touches Quentin's wing before escaping their certain death..or maybe inflicting pain since they are both pretty tough to handle this. Quentin sighs in relief of his escape but not before the two looking at the sky filled eye of an annoyed girl.

“Wow, you little things are pretty fast, aren't you? But I really don’t have time to-wait a minute...” Corrin sense two strange yet familiar draconic aura like her royal siblings have and it’s coming from these tiny 'bugs' in front of her. “Wait…Could It be…It can’t be…”

Quentin and Cross notice the large digits is coming towards them and was about to avoid them until Corrin said she’s not going to harm them. Not with any choice, the two remains still as the fingers gently closed down on the Dranguas, moving them even closer to her red eye.

Huh. She got the same eye color as mine...gotta admit, it sure looks nice. Quentin thought to himself.

Corrin carefully examines the tiny beings and realize they aren't insects, they are human beings! Corrin lets out a gasp and quickly gets up from the bed, surprise and shock.

“Oh my god! I’m…I’m so sorry! I almost kill you two!” Corrin apologizes repeatedly.

"Hmph. I have a right mind to skewer your eye out right now..." Cross huffs.

“C-Cross! Don't mind him, he's...a bit moody today.” Quentin chuckles a bit. "Anyway, we are not injured, no need to apologize."

Corrin sighs in relief, seeing the two is alright…yet, surprisingly, they speak in her language. Perhaps talking to the two will get to know them better, especially since they carrying the dragon’s blood. The girl sets the Dranguas in the palm of her hand while sitting in the bed again.

“My name is Corrin, I’m a princess of Hoshido as well as Nohr. Mind telling me what is your name?”

Princess...!?

Shit...

The two were kinda shocked that the target they suppose to be after is her...and to make it worst, she's a princess which is a big no-no of the NanoCorps rules. They look about each other for a second before Cross simply shrug and looks at the princess who is confused about their actions.

“Uhh...I'm Quentin Andross, leader of NanoCorps: the greatest mercenaries in the world and this gloomy one is Cross, a member of NanoCrops. We did come with the others, but it seems we got separated for unknown reason. Anyway, I notice you are a dragon, right? We can sense it within you.”

“I do, with the help of Dragonstones, I can take the form of a dragon.” Corrin was actually kinda surprised that Quentin was able to tell she carries dragon’s blood. “How did you know?”

"Stone? A mere stone that helps you turn into a dragon? Pfft..." Cross said, crossing his arms.

“Cross!" Quentin glares at him." Ugh...We are Drangua: A race of human/dragon. We may have the appearance of humans but have a soul and power of the dragon. Though as a now, the Dranguas are extinct…there are few survivors, thank goodness. It’s rather kinda hard for me to explain it.” Quentin looks down with a sigh.

“Oh…I’m sorry. I didn’t know…” Corrin lowers her finger, gently rubbing the little Drangua’s head. She tried to rub Cross's little head, but the Blood Drangua simply prick her massive digit with one of his summon blood swords, telling her he is not a confront type of guy. “S-Sorry...maybe I should keep you two here with me until you’re friends come back. Sounds good?”

“Sounds like a good idea, but uhh...before we do that, mind if you put on some clothes?” Quentin said while looking away. Corrin doesn’t know what he talking about until it has hit her. She realizes she has no clothes on except her bra and panties. The princess shrieks in embarrassment, unaware her piercing shriek hurts the Dranguas' ears, and trying to cover her garments with one hand.

“Good thing, we didn't bring Danny with us, he’ll jump on you like a happy little pet who won’t leave you alone and stalking you.” Quentin laughs.

“Good to know...I-I must apologize once more, with your unexpected appearance, I didn’t notice I was in my bra and panties. I should get in more comfortable clothes, mind if I go change?”

“Of course, Princess Corrin. We will wait for your return.” Quentin said with a bow while Cross simply looks away.

The princess smiles as she sets Quentin and Cross down on her bed and head towards the other room, not before Quentin and Cross get a nice view of her shapely rear, almost as if she’s…flirting with them. Quentin quickly shakes his head of dirty thoughts, worrying he may become like Danny and it is a pretty bad sign…

"...A rather nice caboose she got there..." Cross said as Quentin jumps in shock with a blush on his face.

"Dammit, Cross! You had to say something slick!"

Sighing, Quentin decided to contact his team before Corrin comes back and make a decision of telling the princess the reason why they come here or not…
