....In the middle of the plains known as Middle La Noscea....



The bright portal emerges out of thin air, frightening the small Wharf Rats and Lambs away while the giant green plant like monster known as Goobbue simply yawns and walk away...not without grabbing and munching down on one of the rats. "Lucky guess?" The Roegadyn shurgs with a smile before it disappears as Sollenne turns to her, though unable to see her through her helmet but she can she is not in a mood for jokes."Sorry...seriously, I have no idea how he knows about Eorzea."

"You don't think those Garleans are working with Micro?" Sumiye said, still on the ground looking for the boys.

"Highly doubt it..." Vixen rubs her chin. "Anyway, we should go find the guys before we can do anything else...Sapphire and Sollenne? Since the two of you know more about Eorzea, where are we now?"

"Middle La Noscea. I remember a farm called Summerford Farms is nearby. I can take you from there."

"Cool! Lead the way, Sapphire!"

Vixen and the girls follow Sapphire to Summerford Farms for any information about the guys but little did they know...the guys did arrive not too long ago, but they instead arrived in a small cavern.



....Inside the cave known as Seasong Grotto.....




The other half of NanoCorps emerges from the portal to their new location, noticing that they have shrunken as they saw a towering stone tablet, carved in words, in front of them, but also notice the girls haven't shown up before the portal closes behind them.

"Uh-oh...that's not good." said Zeke.

"They could possibly be arriving at a different location. Beta, can you detect them?" Quentin asks the robot.

"I already did, Master Andross. They are indeed here and they are heading north to a settlement called Summerford Farms. However, I did notice something different about them. It seems that the females are actually in normal size."

"They haven't shrunk? Seems the doc's invention half-worked." said Revenant.

"So it seems..." Hadaron said, folding his arms. "We will have words with our 'friend' later. But as now, we gotta figure where are located."

"Hmm...I wonder what it said?" Zeke looks up at the monolith. "Might be some kind of prayer or something?"

"I am still gathering data about the location, might take some time."

"Alright. Guess we will wait for the doc to contact us." Quentin sighs

As the mercs waited for Micro to call them, they heard a loud echo of a voice appears out of nowhere, startling the mercs and got their weapons out for a sudden ambush.


I am the waves that bear.
I am the winds that guide.
I am the evening stars.
I am the morning sky.
I am born of the sea.
And there shall I die.



The mercs turn around, ready to attack an unknown enemy. Quentin saw what appears to be a female feline with a light brown skin tone and brown markings on her face, light teal eyes, and white hair with two frontal pigtails tied with rings and dresses in a white dalmatica with silver patterns, blue trousers and black ankle boots, and, of course, she's gigantic compared to them.

Quentin immediately orders the mercs to stand down, viewing the woman as not a threat.

"Thus reads the sailors' requiem carved into yonder stone." The mysterious woman spoke once more before walking towards the NanoCorps, each step creates loud booming noise and the ground beneath their feet shakes rapidly with every step she takes before coming to a stop right in front of the mercs. Some mercs marvel at the sheer size of the giant feline, the boots itself making them feel like mere insects.

"Such words well describe the manner in which the citizens of Limsa Lominsa live their lives. It is both a litany against misfortune for those out on the waves...and a prayer that the souls of those who perish on land might find their way back to the sea."

"Huh. So it's a prayer/funeral?" said Zeke.

"Pretty much." said Quentin.

"Hmm...Coming out from the light, I do believe you are not from here." The feline said while slowly get on her knees without harming the NanoCorps.

"Yeah. We have just arrived here in this cave-hold on, how did you know?"

" I thought myself on the trail of the kidnappers, instead, I stumble upon a mysterious group of small individuals...who does not match the kidnappers. Alas, it would seem I have missed my mark."

"Heh, yeah. We're not the right size of being kidnappers..." Quentin chuckles a bit before he and the others heard a noise coming from the entrance.

"What was that?" Revenant said, getting out his sword.

"Threat detected. A very large creature is approaching us."

Just then, a large Goobbue appear outside the entrance, letting out a threatening growl before stomping its way towards them.

"..Or perhaps not." The woman lowers her hand near the NanoCorps, offering a lift. Not much left with a choice, they got onto her hand, one by one, except for Hadaron who simply summons his wings and took flight. The woman lifts the NanoCorps near her chest level before facing the Goobbue as it got close to them and letting out a roar.

" As I suspected, the aetheric disturbance here is no natural occurrence. Nor is it a coincidence that the mysterious small individuals and I should come here in search of those responsible for the disappearances only to be attacked. But who stands to benefit from the keeping of this secret?"

"Technically, kid, we weren't. However, we do have ill will against kidnappers." said Zeke while getting his sniper rifle out.

"And it's our job to save innocent people from harm, no matter how dangerous it is." said Beta.

"Many believe we are heroes...unfortunately, we are not. But it is our duty and code to protect lives from threats. " The knight said along with Ton who simply grunts in agreement.

"Right. Such thoughts must wait. I must attend to the task at hand, unpleasant though it be...unless you all can assist me? Despite your size?"the woman asked them, knowing that they may have powers.

"Hmph. You have no idea who're talking to." Hadaron floats near the rest of the group. "Give us the orders, boy."

"Right then. NanoCorps! Take down that monster!" Quentin shouted an order with the group shouted 'Yes, sir!'. The feline woman, amaze of their actions, simply smiles before getting out her wand which resembles a tree branch, ready to fight against the raging Goobbue...

1253321.content:
(Chosen hunters: Quentin, Zeke, Atomic, Viz, Slick, Danny, Beta, Ralph, Petrie, Sharper)

The selected hunters emerge from the space-time portal and find themselves in what appears to be a peaceful residential area, with plenty of playing kids -- Uptown Springdale. Except the entire area looks unusually big...

Or...are the Nanocorps just...small?

Just then, a shady figure -- possibly a businessman -- rushes past the tinies, who thankfully avoid being stomped as he evades a fifth-grade boy and his ghostly-looking butler.

"Stop right there!" the boy yells. "What's the deal with Springdale's seals weakening?!"

"You'll never get me to talk," the shady man refuses.

"I guess if he won't confess on his own, we'll need help from a Yo-kai!" the ghost butler declares. "You know what to do, Nate!"

"Alright then, Whisper!" Nate responds. "Come on out, my friend! Yo-kai medal, do your thing!"

Nate inserts a medal into a funky white watch on his wrist, and from out of the blue, an epicly weird chant is heard:

"Summoning mysterious..!"

From a strange sigil appears a small (well, by Yo-kai standards), granny-like entity with short white hair. Surely this is the Nanocorps' target.

"Tattletell!"

"OK, Tattletell," Nate instructs, "let's see what this guy has to say!"

"Tell! TELL!" Tattletell replies, with the only word she seems able to use. Then she latches onto the weird man's face, using her power to Inspirit him.

"Once the seals are fully broken," the man says involuntarily, "the human world will stand no chance!"

As soon as Tattletell releases her grip, the shady man vanishes in a burst of purple smoke, revealing his true, blue, bird-like form -- a Yo-kai known as Tengloom!

"Gah!" Tengloom reacts. "When will you humans learn?!"

At that moment, Tengloom prepares himself for a battle with six of Nate's summoned Yo-kai friends, while Tattletell happens to get distracted by tiny creatures on the street nearby...

"Tell?"

Crud! She's onto the hunters! What will happen next?

125333232.content:
(The selected group: Quentin, Zeke, Danny, X, Abigor, Viz, Cross, Beta, Morrigan, and Coventina)


Arriving from the portal first, Morrigan and Coventina emerge at their new location which is a rather fancy room. While the device did succeed in its transportation part, the shirking part, however, doesn't seem to work as the two remain the same size. The deity, who didn't care about the size problem, took notice of a large portrait of a young beautiful woman posing for the image, though something is a bit off with this portrait, but couldn't possibly tell what it is...the deity's thoughts were interrupted when her and Morrigan's communication chimes through their ears.

"Morrigan here. Awaiting your command." The woman answered. "...Quentin. Glad you are safe."

"Yes, we are happy you are alive and well. Now, tell them to get their assess over here so we can get this over with! I need my beauty sleep and I do NOT want to look hideous in the morning!" The Seasnaga hisses.

"...Floor? You mean 1st floor?" Morrigan said. "...Hmm? Near...I see...Yes, I will tell her."

"Well? Where are they?" Coventina said, tapping her foot impatiently as Morrigan cut off the communication.

"...I would advise you not to tap your foot..."

"Oh? Does it bother you?" The Seasnaga smirks and did a few foot tapping.

"...Not really. But I wouldn't say about our teammates...They are right near your foot." Morrigan said, simply pointed at the floor near her foot.

"Huh...!?" Coventina stops and quickly looks down, sees a group of dots moving around and upon a closer look, she lets a gasp...realizing that the dots are indeed the missing teammates.



....Earlier...




Quentin and the group arrive through the portal with no changes on their body except for their height and while they are waiting for Morrigan and Coventina to come, the portal suddenly closes from behind. Danny was crying hysterically as the girls didn't make it and comment about wanting to snuggle one of them, and resulting in him being smacked by Abigor. While the group waits for either Quentin or Zeke's commands or Micro's information, they were greeted by a massive earthquake that shook the entire group, followed by a what seems to be several miles high wall of a black object. The group craning their necks back to see five fleshy like objects, fidgeting against on the object and upon furthering up, while they couldn't see the face, they saw those massive 'mounatins', covering in a bikini, are blocking the view, but Danny immediately recognize this massive creature, in a rather comical way, that it is Morrigan, and also pointed out that Coventina is behind her, how he knows is he recognize the..'sea' scent coming from her,,,

Dodging from their incoming feet and stopping right near Coventina's sandal, unware Danny climb up the sandal wall and got a little 'personal touch' with her big purple toe, Quentin quickly taps into his communication to connect one of the girls before they are crushed. He was able to contact Morrigan and responded, though her voice rings out across their ears and informs her that they are near the Seasnaga's foot. Coventina's god-like voice echoes through their ears and her massive foot begins tapping, nearly send them flying as dust and little particles are blown away until Morrigan tells her that they are near her foot.

Coventina courches down to get a better look at the shrunken boys and lets out a gasp as she sees them waving at her. The deity scoops the mercs, except Danny, into her hand, sighing of relief.



....Present Time...




"Thank goodness you are all safe!" The Seasnaga said with a small grin on her face.

"You? A self-righteous wanna be ruler worrying about us? Now that is rich..." X huffs.

"Silence, you furry animal or I'll crush you!"

"But more importantly, we are together...though where is Danny?" Morrigan asked.

"...I have a feeling that sneaky bastard is somewhere on Coventina's footwear...admiring her toes..." said the demon butler.

"What!?!"

The deity looks at her toes and low and behold, there is the womanizer, still clinging to her big toe. Enrage...and somewhat amused by his actions, Coventina fidgets her toe enough to knock Danny onto the sandal's platform and gently pins him under her toe.

"Damn that mortal! I should have crushed right now...but I'll let him live, for the sake of our leader..."

Quentin sigh before a beeping sound from their communication and the voice of Dr.Micro appears, laughing as usual.

"Mwhahaha! Glad to see you boys and girls are alive and well! Though my readings are showing something...different among the group?"

"Yeah. The device sort of worked...it leaves us shrunken, but not Morrigan and Coventina."

"Wh-What!? Well...that is still a success, right?"

"I guess. Anyway, who's our target?"

"I wouldn't call her a target, just yet...she's a Wingly who can fly around in the air and such, and she posses a very powerful weapon called the Moon Dagger, not much I know of and that's pretty much it. Oh, and you better make sure she finds you lots."

"Huh?" Quentin and the others look at each other, confuse of what the crazy doc is saying.

"Trust me. I'll uh, explain it to you all later once she contacts me."

"Hold it. What do you mean by 'once she contacts you'?" The B.Drangua asked.

"L-Like I said, just play along. She thinks I'm some sort of trader, it is the only way to get close to that female Wingly."

Quentin frowned at Dr.Micro's words, along with the others, not sure to trust him or not...The leader looks at the co-leader for any advice to this situation, the only response from the wise gunman is a simple nod, meaning to go along with the plan.

"Alright doc, we'll do it. But if this plan screws up, I'll send some mercs who hate you a lot and...well, you know what happens next."

"My...an easy-going leader who makes threats...I like that." Coventina smirks.

"Eep, d-duly noted...right now she's escaping from her pursuers after she just reveals herself, she's heading to your location as we speak, so get ready to be noticed and I wished you luck, and of course I'll be here if you contact me once you are all safe, good luck~!" The doctor laughs before cutting off.

"...I wish his plan would screw up." Viz growls.

"...Who's bright idea to take this job?" Cross said before glaring at Quentin.

"Eh, heh...uhh Beta? Where is the Wingly at?"

"She is now flying towards the opening of the window ledge behind the couch. I suggest we make haste." said Beta.

"Why? Can't she just use the door behind us?" Morrigan pointed at the door behind them.

"Negative. I detected a large group of soldiers marching throughout the castle and they are getting close to this room. Again, I suggest we make haste."

"And haste we shall. You heard the robot, ladies, Take us to the windows!" Quentin orders the giant mercs.

"What about Danny?" Morrigan asked Coventina of his safety. The Seasnaga checks her little prisoner to see if he's still moving, she felt a little squirm and possible felt a kiss from him...causing her eyebrow to twitch and press her big toe against him with more pressure.

"...He's fine. Let's go."

With just a brief run, the mercs made it to the edge of the opening ledge and not a moment too soon: The castle's soldiers burst through the door, spotting the girls and quickly think they are with the Wingly.

"Halt! You two shall come with us!"

"Damn, I didn't except those soldiers to move so fast." Zeke said while the mercs look for the Wingly.

"Where the hell is that woman!? She better get here or I may have to kill-"

"HEY! OVER HERE!"

A loud feminine voice appears from the edge, startle a few mercs. The girls look over at the edge and see's a silver-haired woman dressed rather revealing clothing and a bandanna on her head, and a pair of light blueish wings on her back, and seems to be cover in cuts and bruises. The woman waves at them before flying away and with the soldiers getting closer to them, Coventina sighs and snaps her unoccupied fingers, creating a large circular like water beneath the girls' feet and flies off into the skies, leaving the soldiers in awe and covered in water from the blast, disappears from their sight...

Morrigan and Coventina, along with the Wingly, escape the archers' range with no arrows hitting them and to make sure they won't return fire, The Seasnaga summons a thunderstorm hovering the castle before pouring down the soldiers with heavy rain.

"Nice going, kid. They won't be looking for us for a while." said Zeke.

"My word...Cross, the deadly Blood Drangua, actually has feelings?" Abigor said with a chuckle.

Once again, she presses her toes down on him in anger before checking on the Wingly.

"Hey, winged woman! It is about time to stop flying and rest?"

The woman, was shocked by the two riding on a water-like object, looks at the two mercs with a frown at first, but then her mouth slowly forms a smirk.

"Heh. I forgot you are with me. Alright then, ladies, we'll make a pit stop right around here and deal with this...strange situation." The Wingly notice they are flying over a forest, a good resting spot as long there are no wild vicious monsters or soldiers interrupt her.

"Agreed...though not is weird in MY situation..." Coventina grumbles about Danny and his pervy actions. "Anyway, hurry up and land or you'll rather be dead?"

"Heh...well aren't you a feisty one?" The woman teases at the Seasnaga,

The NanoCorps and the Wingly descend into the brush green forest, spotted a small river streaming down and a nice shaded spot nearby, perfect for her to rest. As the Wingly landed safely with the mercs landed as well, she collapsed against the tree, out of breath and soring from her latest fight. This is where the NanoCorps should either heal the mysterious Wingly and get information about her or leave her be and tried contacting Micro so he can explain the situation...but before they can do that...

Coventina flicks Danny off from her toes with a disgusted look as she places the other mercs on the ground near him. The pervy merc frantically trying to get back onto her foot, but Abigor stops him with a swift chop to the neck, causing him to collapse to the ground...

1253333121.content:
(The selected group: Quentin, Zeke, Zella, Amber, Flare, Android 100(Hundred), Rive, Zyla, Ella, and Rine)



The selected NanoCorps emerges from the portal, viewing of their new location. It’s quite dark and gloomy with little light from the large window from above and candles flicker on the stand, giving a more ominous feeling in the atmosphere. The team turns to notice three giant stone like pillars with one statue of a figure holding a sword right near the neck.

“Huh..no one's here...and why do I have a weird feeling that something gonna attack us...?” said Rive.

“Really, Rive? Are you trying to scare us?” Rine chuckles a bit. "Seriously though, where is our target? Did that jackass doc screw up the device?"

"That note did say it will take us to the target's location. Maybe we should wait for him to contact us.” The lamia Zella said while slithers around from one side to another.

“I guess...in the meantime, what's our location?” Quentin asked Hundred who tapped into her high tech visor

“It's kinda fuzzy, but I pick the name called High Wall of Lothric. I'm still gathering more information.”

“Alright then, since there's no one around here, we'll settle here til Micro call us and gives us the information on our target." Quentin said before getting a strange chill blowing against his shoulder, causing the Drangua on high alert. "...Rive might be right, something's not right here...keep your guard just in case."

The mercs nodded in agreement until Amber calling out her teammates, startling them.

“Guys! Guys! Look! The door!” Amber shouted and pointed at the opened doors as it beings to closing itself slowly with a gust of wind flowing in, blowing the candles out in progress.

“Hmm..haunted perhaps?” said Zeke.

“No way. If it was haunted, I could've sensed a supernatural activity in a second.” Rine scatches her head.

"Whatever it is, keep your guard up. We don't want to get ambushed while were small, it'll be pretty bad if that-" Quentin then heard Hundred shouted warnings that something is appearing above them!

As the mercs look up right after hearing dripping sound near the now closed doors and see more of the black like water substance dropping down from above. The team spotted a massive figure emerges from a black foggy portal, dropping towards the ground in a rather elegant landing. The figure lets out a breathing noise and slowly rising up, turning towards the statues where the NanoCorps are located with a sword cloaked in flames in its hand. This creature appears to be a female-looking humanoid with impossibly long, slender limbs clad in silver plated armor running up and down her body, with a veil trailing from the head. She has a twisted crown that holds the veil up and a metal grille that covers her face.

“What the hell is that?” said Flare

“It looks like a...some kind of human-like monster...and it feels quite in pain..." Ella said, reading the mind of the giant monster.

“Wait. I just got something...and it's about this monster we're facing," said Hundred "She was one of the daughters in a royal family but was ordered by a man to become a dancer first, and then legionnaire, which is equal to exile. He also gifted her dual blades, infused with darkness and fire, similar to his own weapons…From my understanding, she became this monster by an unknown force, or maybe fate, and is now known as the Dancer of the Boreal Valley.”

“Dancer, huh? Really sad about her fate... I wonder-“ Quentin notice the Dancer is slowly making her way towards their location, each step she took made a loud clicking sound like woman’s heeled shoe. “And she is coming this way. Get ready, everyone.”

“Meh, I doubt she notice us..." Rive huffs, but her eyes widen a bit when the Dancer lunges her sword towards them without warning.

The mercs didn’t have enough time to get out of the way nor was preparing to teleport away, but one certain merc knew this will going to happen. Zyla quickly gets in front of the rest and simply blocks the towering flaming sword’s tip with her specter, creating a powerful shockwave. The shockwave pushes few mercs against the stone statue and. not surprisingly, pushes the Dancer back and falls down on her back, despite being gigantic compared to the strongest member of the selected group.

“Oh my. It seems that was a bit too much...my apologies, miss Dancer.” Zyla said with a smile.

“Wow...never underestimate a student's teacher." Quentin chuckles.

"You got that right..." Rive sighs before noticing the Dancer getting back up, breathing heavily as it seems to be anger.

“Ella, I think this is a good time to move us!” Quentin orders the ESP as he sees the Dancer is about to grab them. Ella nodded and surrounded her teammates in green aura before disappearing right before the Dancer slams her hand down, only that her preys got away safely. The NanoCorps reappear behind the Dancer with no one being harm though they are now facing the Dancer’s rather large rear...

"Hmm...for a monster, she does have a rather big caboose." said Zeke.

“Zeke! Not in front of the girls,” Quentin sighs.

The Dancer slowly turns around to find the mercs behind her and moves slowly and vaguely towards them.

“What now, Quentin? Can we fight the monster now? Amber asked him.

“Well, we can’t hide from her as if she knows our presence very quickly...yep, we're gonna have to fight her. She may have some weakness.”

“A good idea, Lord Quentin. I shall stay here and observe the fight." said Zyla.

"...Really? For a teacher, you sure are lazy..." Rive huffs before being slapped on the head by her teacher.

"Watch your tone. I will assist you if you are in trouble."

“Alright, I will attack her from afar.” Zeke pulls out his favorite sniper rifle.

“Then the rest of us will go full assault on the monster. Alright, let's move out, everyone!” With the order from their leader, Quentin and the NanoCorp begins their battle against the giant Dancer...

The selected Corps emerges from the bright portal into a strange, yet dark world. In front of the group is what sort of looks like a beach with strange, almost organic rock formations and a glowing light that shines across the dark murky water that acts as a moon. While this place is certainly new to them, Quentin, and possibly the others, has an ominous feeling that something bad is gonna happen if they don't hurry and complete this mission, but it seems his ominous feeling is about to happen when Delta alerts the group that an unknown creature is heading this way.

"Master Andross. An unrecognized creature is approaching us and it's likely to attack us. I suggest we arm ourselves and combat this creature."

"Wha-What are you talking about, Delta? There's nothing here but-what the fuck?!" Danny screams in terror when a giant dark-skinned creature emerges from the ground in front of them and attempts to swipe at the group. They quickly get out of its path, though Revenant stood his ground and clash its giant claws with his giant sword. The two seemingly matched of the struggles until the knight, uses his dark power to strengthen himself, pushes the giant creature's claw away, sending it straggling before it was killed by the knight's Dark Terra Slash.

"Way to go, big guy!" Danny runs up and pats the knight's back.

"I wouldn't celebrate just yet...I can sense more of these creatures are heading this way..."

"And you might be right." Quentin said as he and the others spotted two more giant creatures emerges from the shadow and tries to attack them.

"Best we spread out before we get crushed!"

Zeke and Sasha fire two bullets at the creatures, hitting them in the eyes which is enough to stun them. Cross summons his blood scythe and flies over at the first creature's leg, slicing it. The creature, though doesn't seem to be making any noises, stumbles to the ground before it felt a sharp shocking pain from its left side as Jackle unleashed his electric power at it. The creature tries to swipe at the renegade but was block by Sumiye, who uses the DNA, and grabs its arm, ripping it off. The creature fell backward, losing its strength and energy before it was finally killed by Cross's Blood Dragon Fist, disappearing into nothing.

With the first one gone, they turn their attention to the second creature...though it doesn't seem they need any assistance. The second one is down on the ground with Revenant piercing his sword against its chest, Zark strikes one of its eyes while Quentin takes out the other, Delta slashes its lower half multiple times with her beam sword, and Zeke and Sasha fires every round from their weapons until it disappears.

"Whew...everyone alright?" Quentin asked them as the mercs regroup.

"Tch, it was nothing, but what the hell was that?" said Jackle.

"Delta?"

"I am still gathering data, but the place we are in now is called the Realm of Darkness. " Delta inform. "The area we are located now is called Dark Margin."

"Realm of Darkness? Dark Margin? Talk about cheesy names"

"You're the one to talk. Don't tell me this is where our target is located." said Sumiye.

"I hope so. If not, we're gonna have a talk to our friend."

"Careful everyone. More creatures are coming...and it is in large force."

"Really? Cause I don't see any-" Danny spotted three more giant dark creatures emerging from the shadows. "Never mind."

The mercs ready themselves for another battle until they notice multiple dark creatures appear around them, surrounding them with no way to escape and closing in.

"Damn...looks like this is it." said Zeke.

"Who's the bright idea to accept this request..."

"Not now, Cross..." Quentin sighs. "But I'm not going down without a fight."

"Got that right, boss! Bring them on!" Jackle shouted.

"..Jackle should deserve an honorable death..."

"The hell that supposes to mean, blood jackass!?"

Quentin rolls his eyes before seeing the giant creatures get closer and closer and the mercs brace themselves for another big fight until...

"Firaga!"

A large ball of fire appears from behind, hitting few creatures, causing them to disappear. The remaining ones skid to a stop and turns around, only to be hit by another fireball. The last remaining creature looks around, noticing its fellow comrades has vanished, it starts running away in a panic but it too got hit by the last fireball, disappearing from the hunters' sight.

"Whoa...what happen?"

"I believe the woman who uses magic could be responsible."

Zeke points towards a feminine figure that is walking towards them. The woman appears to be tall, gigantic to the tiny hunters, and slender with medium-length blue hair and blue eyes. She wears a black and navy blue, high-collared halter top, a black corset with two pairs of white laces and black shorts, white bell-sleeves with small, segmented piece of armor on each of her upper arms and tan, fingerless gloves, black stockings reaching about halfway up her thighs, two strips of blue cloth draped over each of her hips and armored silver boots with sharp hook in the outer side.

"Hot Damn! What a woman~!" Danny drools at the sight of his savior.

"Oh brother...anyway, she did save us, though did she saw us? Sumiye asked.

"Only one way to find out..." Quentin said while watching the giant woman getting closer and closer with each booming steps she takes...

"Well, I guess we're here!" Quentin said as he and the selected members have finally ended up in their destination.

"Can you please tell us what's 'here' is...?" asked Cross. Everyone took a good look at their surroundings, but something seemed a little off; everything around them is huge!

She's the shrine maiden of the Hakurei Shrine in which you're all in right now. Now find her and hunt her down! I want good results and no bad ones, muhahaha!" The mad scientist laughs before cutting off.

"Hey, boss...can I put a few rounds at the doc after this? "Dave asked the Drangua. "

"...We will see. Now then, where is miss Reimu? Shame we didn't bring any A.I. with us..." said Quentin as the group looks around for the Reimu...
1253333321.title: The Shrine Maiden Temple

12533333211.content:
Just as they begin looking for Reimu, a loud humming noise appear out of nowhere follow by a loud booming sound. The mercs quickly turn to the loud source, only to be facing a very large shoe shaped object heading towards them. They quickly dive out of the way before the shoe crashes down at the spot they were, blowing them a few feet away.

"Damn...that was close." Froze sighs while he and Dave, along with the Direagles, recovers. the golem Boulder got up while holding X, Cross, and Slick (who is sleeping), protecting them from any debris. Zeke and Ryx were unharmed as well, regrouping with the others, though the two was able to get a description of the target who almost step on them: Reimu, the target's name, has brown-black hair with a red ribbon. a traditional Miko uniform that Sasha remembers the outfit with a red hakama over a white kimono, white tabi socks, and red shoes. She seems to be heading to her bed for a little relaxation for today.

"Everyone alright?" Zeke asked the others

"Yeah. It was really a shame we didn't bring Beta or one of his 'children" with us," said Dave

"Boulder...you can put us down now."

Boulder looks at the Blood Drangua and nods, dropping them to the floor.

"Hmm...seems Quentin and Ethelinda is missing.." said Ryx,

"Yep, I don't see them...Oh wait, there they are." Froze spotted the two on the ground. "Seems like they are okay-wh-what the...?"


The group walk over to where Froze was looking and were kinda shocked to see what they are looking at: Quentin was laying on top of Ethelinda with half of his body buried on the Drangua's large bust and the Drangua herself was actually smiling! The young Drangua groans, notice something soft around his body and reach out to grab whatever it is, much to everyone shock and Ethelinda lets a soft coo that causes Quentin to quickly pull his head out, facing Ethelinda's smiling face...Realizing he actually landed on her by accident and grabbing her large breast, Quentin quickly gets off of her and moves away in a panic.

" I-I-I am so sorry, Ethelinda! I-I didn't mean to grab your...I am sorry!" Quentin bowing down repeatedly, even gets on the ground with his head down.

"Hehe, it's quite alright." The Drangua got up and walks over to him before petting him on the head. "Besides, I wouldn't mind cuddling with you and Cross."

"Ugh...".

"Good thing Danny isn't with us. He'll have a fit and wants to cuddle with you." said Zeke.

"And he'll get a nice slapping if that happens."

"Enough! L-Let's drop this subject for now and focus on Reimu! A-Any other information we should know?"

"As Micro said before: Reimu is a Shrine Maiden, they are generally virgins and take various rites of purity and chastity, and undergo various forms of physical and mental training. They also practice sealing and purification rituals, which are highly form-based and symbolic, and are used to bless, purify, or exorcise vengeful spirits" Ryx explains.

"Huh...perhaps we could call a Shrine Maiden to do a purify on a certain man." Dave said while looking at Reimu.

"...I highly doubt Danny would agree to this idea...but it'll be funny to watch."

"I second that." X smirks.

Quentin sighs before waking and ordering Slick to teleport them on Reimu's body, the sloth groans in annoyance and begins surrounding the hunters in glowing purple light before disappearing into thin air, but where would they in up?
12533333211.title: Reimu's Apperance

choices: White Day: A Labyrinth Named School
125333333.title: Here we go again...More choices

choices: Ghost Girls are my kind of thing
1253333331.content:
Ooooh, entering the scary White Day game eh? Hope you and the NanoCorps are brave enough to challenge the ghosts...as well as avoiding being crushed by the unaware girls who locked themselves in the haunted school.

Now then, will it be the living or the dead?
1253333331.title: School...of the Dead

choices: Miss C, a.k.a, The Housemistress Spirit
Ji-hye, a.k.a, The Lying Female Student
12533333312.content:
Hunting ghost eh? Good luck...you'll need it~

Now, who's the lucky undead girls?
12533333312.title: Who you gonna call?  Ghost- err, NanoCorps!

choices: Da-som, a.k.a,  The Girl Outside the Window
125333333123.content: Another batch of ghostly girls have arrived~
125333333123.title: More Ghostly Ghouls

choices: Eun-ah, a.k.a, The Girl with a Hidden Face
1253333331233.content: Another pair to hunt down~
1253333331233.title: Even more Ghostly Ghouls!

choices: Beta finds the token and begins create a duplicate
Sharper hears a same feminine talking to him...
12533333312331.content:
(The selected group: Quentin, Zeke, Ryx, Petrie, Ralph, Sharper, Beta, Jackle, Zealot, and Zark.)


The selected NanoCorps members emerge from the bright portal, into their new destination, and with no changes of their body parts...well, except for their sizes. It appears they are in a room filled with chairs with dimmed lights and equipment for music...thinking the room could be a music or recorder room. As the group begins walking down to the end of the room, their communications started beeping and hear Micro's laughter through the other line.

"Mwhahaha! Welcome to Yeondu High School, here in South Korea!"

"South Korea? Huh, that device really did work...hold up, you said school?" Petrie asked.

"Don't tell me we're killing students...or teachers..." said Ralph.

"Well...not exactly. Yes, it is a student...former student...but this one is different-well let me rephrase that...this whole school is different...at night time, on this specific date."

"The hell you talking about, old man!?" Jackle shouted.

"Ugh...hang on." The mercs can hear Micro typing in to look up the Yeondu High School. "...Alright, I'll give you a short version of it cause there's a whole lot of details. Now then, there are some really bad incidents here in this school, I mean deaths, suicides, and all that creepy shit, but here's where it all begins...from a ritual."

"Ritual...?" said Sharper, already started to shake in fear.

"Oh yes, a crazed woman who lost her daughter in a fire incident tried to revive her in a ritual, using the poor unexpected girl who came to the school last night as a sacrifice. While the ritual did kinda work...it sorta backfires and the results...well it's gruesome and now the school becomes a haunting ground for the spirits that roam here, no chance of escaping as long as you gather the Talismans to break the seal..."

"S-So...right now...this school is haunted?"

"Yep and guess who your first one of the day...It's Eun-ah, the girl with a lost face! Mwhahaha!" the doctor laughs.

"So we are, uh...killing a ghost girl?" Quentin asked.

"Precisely! She's a bit tricky one...shame we didn't have that useful token for this ghost...oh well."

"Wait, what do you mean by that?"

"You'll see...when she appears. Oh and don't look at her face...good luck!" The doctor laughs once more before cutting off.

"What the hell!? What did he mean by that!?"

"Do not worry, Master Jackle. I have enough data about this spirit. I'll explain to you when the event begins." said Beta.

"What event, laddie?" Dr.Zeal asked.

"The event begins once you approach Eun-ah, which she appears right now."

Beta points towards at the end of the left side of the room and the group was surprised by what they saw. There, sitting in the chair is a girl, covering her face with her hands, appearing to be crying. The girl appears as a school girl with black tied into a pigtail and not to mention, she's huge compared to the small mercs.

"What the fuck...? Sh-She wasn't there before! I look over there for a minute when Micro talking to us and no one was there!" said Petrie.

"...So approach her, right?" said Zeke.

"Correct."

"Alright then, let's do this."

The group, while Sharper was being carried by Zark since he is too scared to move, moves closer to the girl. The group got close to her towering loafer, they look past her long leg to get a view of this girl, but they were unable to see her face. While trying to see her face, the giant girl slowly stands up, towering over the NanoCorps and frightening Sharper even more, though she still got her face covered...and then suddenly...their vision goes dark...

"Wh-What the fuck!?!" Sharper shouted in fear.

"Stay close! Maybe the power went out." said Quentin.

"..Such malicious energy...be very caution..." Ryx warns the others before they hear a feminine yet sinster voice echoing their ears...


...Ready or not...
...Here I...
....
...Come...



"Oh shit, oh shit, oh shit!" Sharper keeps repeating the words until he felt a slap on his hand, scaring him even more.

"Shut up, Sharper! Beta, what's the info on this event?" said Petrie.

"According to the data, you must shine a token at her before she turns her head. However, the problem is we do not have a token." said Beta.

"And what happens if she looks at us?" Zeke said before they heard another sinister voice...


...Ready or not...
...Here I...
...Come...



"If she looks at us, we will be dead."

"D-DEAD!?!"

"Calm down, nitwit! Is there an alternated way to defeat her?"

"Only those who do not have vision. Ryx and Zark are the perfect candidates.for this event."

"Hmm...I see. Then Zark and I shall do our best..."


...Ready or not...
...Here I come...



"Uhh...is it me or her words are getting faster?" said Ralph.

"It appears she's about to attack." said Beta.

"Sh-She is!? Oh shit, oh shit, oh shit-"

"Don't start that crap again!"


...Ready or not. Here I...



"Okay, I'm turning on the lights now!"

"Sharper, that is unwise to-"

Sharper frantically presses the exo-suit button that opens two small bright light from the shoulder area and his whole face turns white of what he saw. In front of the mercs is a humongous size female face, staring down at them with her cold eyes and evil wide grin, and a hideous scar covering half her face, slowly opening her mouth and lets out a loud single word that frightens some mercs.


COME!!!!



"AAAAHHHHH!!! IT"S THE GHOST!!!" Sharper screams in fear and quickly turns his head in order not to look at her. Petrie, Ralph, and Zeke quickly grab their guns and fires a single round while Jackle releases a stream of lightning at the giant ghost, but she suddenly disappears while laughing at the mercs.

"Shit, that bitch got away! She'll pay for doing that jumpscare shit at us!" Jackle shouted.

"Be glad she didn't kill us just by looking at her. Think she's toying us before she really wanted to kill us...anyway, just stay close and don't get separated." said Quentin. "Beta, you said something about Sharper not cutting on the lights?"

"Without the token while the lights are on, we will be disadvantaged and Eun-ah will get her hands on one of us. Perhaps I can locate and makeshift the token, we may have a chance to defeat her."

"Get to it and quickly, don't know how long Sharper will last in the dark."

"H-Hey.." Sharper sighs while cutting the lights off, but still can't get over the scared face of Eun-ah...as the group waits for Beta, who begins scanning the entire school grounds, some mercs still feel uneasy with the ghost is waiting and watching the mercs to slip up and attack them, but the one they should be watching is Sharper who could be Euh-ah's first target...
12533333312331.title: School Ghost Story No.9 - The Lost Face

15.title: OC Dimension

info.brief_description: An updated version of the original with over 60 NanoCorps members(True Final Update).
info.description:
Plot


The NanoCorps are a large group of mercenaries and bounty hunters that most members are not ordinary human beings and is led by a young Drangua name Quentin Andross and a mysterious yet trustworthy gunman Zeke. Together, the mercenaries save lives from dangerous criminals and natural disasters, capturing most wanted criminals alive or dead under minutes, thwarting any malicious plans that'll harm citizens, and infiltrate and eliminate evil organizations. It really is a no-brainer why everyone across the world comes to the mercenaries, but not everyone is liking the NanoCorps...

One day at their headquarters called the Flameheart Keep, Quentin, and co., receive a package that contains a letter and a strange device by a mysterious person name Dr.Van Micro. The leader accepts the strange request despite some protest among the group and what happened next will be the most difficult and strangest challenge they ever did. However, unaware of them, they were being monitored by an old arch-nemesis and world's dangerous wanted criminal, Gentleman of Darkness or G.O.D for short, waiting for the right opportunity to strike them...


NanoCorps Members



Male NanoCorps Members





The Drangua Leader
Name: Quentin Andross

Age: 21

Height: 5'12"

Race: Drangua (Dragon/Human race)

NanoCorps' Rank: Founder/Leader/Frontline/Swordsman

Gender: Male

Appearance: At first, Quentin appears to be scrawny underneath his NanoCorps' uniform, but he has a surprisingly well-built physique and as Drangua, he has sharp teeth, his peach skin that is hard as dragon scales, dragon wings that can magically put away and dragon irises. He is considered to be attractive to most women, including some female NanoCorps' members.
Quentin wears a red and black NanoCorps' uniform that was made by the robot Beta: An exo-vest with a black jacket tucked underneath with one sleeve is missing and letters 'N.C' with fire around them imprinted on the back, red scarf, fingerless gloves, utility belt for equipment, black pants with a flame print on one of the legs, and black boots.

Personality: Laid-back and easy going with no sign of fear within him, Quentin is one of the friendliest members of the NanoCorps and shown to be calm and cool-headed when in battle, showing that he never gets angry, though he does get annoyed by some members goofing off, mainly the Three Recon Stooges. However, there are times when he gets upset at G.O.D's malicious plans that will harm or kill innocent people and will take action without hesitation.

Powers & Abilities: As a Drangua, Quentin has superhuman abilities and able to sprout dragon scales to boost his defense. He can produce magma from his scaled arms, sprouts wings from his back, breathes fire, very keen eyesight and a special ability called Dragon Glare: The ability to stop, seemingly paralyzed his opponents with his fierce, piercing red eyes. He is also a strong swordsman, wielding the dual Salamander; a longsword and a giant claymore.



The Wise Co-Leader Marksman
Name: Zeke

Age: Unknown

NanoCorps' Rank: Founder/Leader/Marksman

Gender: Male

Height: 9'7"

Race: Unknown

Appearance: Although most of his body is covered in his old brown poncho, Zeke is very tall and powerfully built hunter with large mechanical arms that most of the mercenaries believe he is a robot like Beta. He also wears an old hat and goggles with a red lens, a large black scarf that covers his entire face except for his eyes and large metal boots.

Personality: Despite his rugged and shady appearance, Zeke is a calm and quiet mercenary that only spoken when needed. Most of the mercenaries came to him for his knowledge. He calls almost everyone a 'kid', even few deities who are more than 10,000 years old, hinting he might be older than her.

Powers & Abilities: Zeke uses his personal and customized sniper rifle named Ol’ Betsy and uses different equipment to assist him. As an ace marksman, he can lock on his targets and snipe them without any misses. If close combat, Zeke uses his large mechanical hands, known as Jack-of-All-Trade, equip with various devices, though he mainly uses the electrostatic to shock or paralyze threats
.


The Invincible Monster
Name: Atomic Vile

Age: 4

NanoCorps' Rank: Frontline/Protector/The Big 6

Gender: Male

Height: 30'12

Race: Bio Life-form

Appearance: Atomic is an enormous, muscular bio-monster with his skin all silver, spiky like hair forming from his skin, sharp teeth, and doesn't appear to have pupils and iris in his eyes, making him more menacing, His appearance is very close to Venom from Spider-Man series except he's silver-colored without the spider symbol, bigger and muscular.

Personality: Despite his ferocious figure, Atomic is actually a laid back and friendly monster, but gets a little rowdy and loud when fighting. He enjoys fighting and tries his best to hold back his strength in order not knock out his opponent.

Powers & Abilities: Atomic is currently the strongest member of the NanoCorps and the strongest out of the Big 6. His monstrous strength alone is enough will make most criminals give up in seconds and his silver skin is indestructible as nothing can scratch/pierce his skin (except for Ryx) and even if he is wounded, he has indestructible nanobots inside him to regenerate his wounds. He has a powerful transformation called Super Atomic; a smaller but more powerful form of Atomic and gained immense speed.
.



The Bionic Arm Merc
Name: Viz 'X' Archer

Age: 22

NanoCorps' Rank: Frontline/Recon

Gender: Male

Height: 6”

Race: Human

Appearance: Viz is a lean-built man with a large X shaped scar on his face, giving him the nickname ‘X', and messy black hair with few strands between his eyes. He lost both his arms during his last ‘mission’ (later reveal it was demons that tore his arm at a young age) and Beta quickly created and giving Viz a powerful set of mechanical arms based on his design. Viz wears a sleeveless black exo-vest with 'NC' on the back, black pants, and combat boots.

Personality: Viz usually shows his strict, serious, and cold personality, determined to get the job done. However, he is very loyal to his fellow teammates and shown to have an ongoing rivalry between himself and Quentin, but in a more friendly term. Viz seems to enjoy the company of Prosperine, a high-class demon, as the two go out together on a mission, showing that the two have feelings for each other. Viz seems to have a hatred of demons for his own reasons (except Rine )and will kill any of them without mercy until it was later revealed to Rine why he hated demons.

Powers & Abilities: Thanks to the newly implanted robotic arms and wearing Exo-suit, Viz is another dangerous force to be reckoned with. The arms granted him super strength, tactical cloaking, changing into weapons like swords and miniguns, smoke screen, and other hidden weapons. Besides his arms, Viz is a powerful leg fighter as he trains his legs before he receives the arms, giving him a boost of jumping skills.




The Robotic Brain
Name: Beta

Age: Unknown

NanoCorps' Rank: Tactician/Inventor

Gender: Genderless (though consider male)

Height: 5'12"

Race: A.I.

Appearance: Beta is an average size slim robot made of black, extremely hard, futuristic material known as XT Cargsten. He has a visor on his face acting as his eyes, spikes on the shoulders and two on his head, waist guard armor, red pulsers on the palm of his hands, and a red circular pulser on his chest.

Personality: Beta does not have any emotions and feelings like most robots do, following the leader's command, but has free will to do anything he wants.

Powers & Abilities: Beta uses his powerful pulsers that can destroy most objects with ease, equipped rocket boots, and has a unique ability that he can go through any solid objects by becoming molecules. He has superhuman abilities though not as strong as his ‘son’ Alpha, but still can throw a powerful punch.



The Cool Womanizer
Name: Danny Von Vantage

Age: 37

NanoCorps' Rank: Recon

Gender: Male

Height: 6'4"

Race: Human

Appearance: Danny is a tall, toned and muscular recon with black hair in a regent pompadour style, with brown eyes, and a star-shaped scar on his left cheek. He wears a black and blue NanoCorps' exo-suit with blue jeans and black cowboy boots.

Personality: Danny is easy going and sometimes lazy, he does joke around with his comrades. However, he does get serious when they are on the mission. He is also a womanizer as he tends to flirt with every woman he can find, including the female mercs, but loves to woo Alanna more than other female mercenaries in the group, even doesn't mind being assaulted by her.

Powers & Abilities: Danny has regular abilities and is a great marksman with guns. Danny's abilities have been improved with the help of his exo suit and give him numerous tactical equipment, jetpack, grappling hook and electrical shocks from the hands. Danny seems to be an expert of hand to hand combat with the help of Vixen, a master of close combat and martial arts.



The Flame Blind Swordsman
Name: Ryx

Age: 48

NanoCorps' Rank: Frontline/Master Swordsman

Gender: Male

Height: 6'10"

Race: Human

Appearance: Ryx is a tall, muscular blind man carrying a sword with him which is located on the hip. He has a massive scar stretching from his neck to his waist and three scars on his face and has stubby hair on his chin. Once removed the cloth from his eyes, it reveals that his entire face, mainly his eyes, is disfigured by a brutal assault (was later confirmed it was a chemical substance), render him to losing his eyes and became blind. Ryx wears a black and red samurai gi with intricate design, gray pants with same design and boots, a straw hat he usually wears on his head, and a black colored cloth wrap around his eyes.

Personality: Ryx is a silent yet strict warrior who carries himself with grace and dignity, maintaining many subtle mannerisms of a traditional samurai. He is the strong silent type, speaking when he feels it's necessary.

Powers & Abilities: Ryx is a world renown swordsman with Absolute Swordsmanship and immense superhuman abilities who cut just about anything with amazing precision. His sword, the Enkou, is a long sword that releases intense heat and powerful fire projectiles, even sharpen its blade to gain more strength.



The Telekinesis Sloth
Name: Slick

Age: 18

NanoCorps' Rank: ESP/Teleporter/Protector

Gender: Male

Height: 4’9"

Race: Human

Appearance: Slick is a short, lanky teen with his skin being pale. He has short spiky black hair with white tips, red eyes and a tattoo that said 'Sloth' on his back. Sloth wears the NanoCorps’ exo suit with an upward collar and the left sleeve has been cut off, metal gauntlet on the left hand, black pants with dark purple on the sides and boots

Personality: Slick is very lazy and tends to sleep a lot, even during missions. However, like Danny, he can get the job done if he wants to. Despite this, he gets along with everyone, especially his fellow ESPer Ella.

Powers & Abilities: Despite being lazy, Slick is a very powerful ESP as he can lift objects with his mind, teleport, creating shields to block any attacks, and attacks his targets with Pyrokinesis and Cryokinesis.



The Three Recon Stooges
Name: Petrie, Ralph, & Sharper

Age: 29(P), 25(R), 20(S)

NanoCorps' Rank: Recons

Gender: Males

Height: 6'2"(P), 6'(R), 5'11(S)

Race: Humans

Appearances: Petrie is a tall, well-built man with fair skin color, and has brown hair with a curly mustache. Ralph is a slim man with peach skin, black buzz-cut hair and a small scar on his left cheek. Sharper is a rather skinny young man with peach skin, white spiky hair, and has freckles across his face. All three wears the exact same black exo-suits though different colors (blue for Petrie, red for Ralph, yellow for Sharper), black pants, and boots though Petrie wears goggles on his forehead.

Personalities: Petrie is more strict than the other two, arguing with them, in a goofy way. However, he enjoys goofing off, along with Ralph and Sharper. Ralph is lazy of the three and speaks of sarcasm most of the time. Sharper is timid of the three, often getting scared more easily and loves to eat.

Powers & Abilities: The three wears exo suits like Danny does, giving them enhanced abilities and equipment. Petrie's suit is colored blue while Ralph's red and Sharper's yellow. They are expert marksmen but not as strong as Zeke and Zurge and good close combat skills. They also acquire unique abilities from eating three strange fruits that give Petrie the ability to make anything explodes by touching them before snapping his fingers, Ralph has the ability to fold his body like paper and becomes sharp as steel blade, and Sharper has the ability to shrink down to ½ inch and the more he shrinks, the more powerful he’ll become.




The Western Bullseye
Name: Zurge Bane

Age: 45

NanoCorps' Rank: Marksman

Gender: Male

Height: 7'7"

Race: Human

Appearance: Zurge appears to be a tall, well-built man who sounds from the old western. He wears a black trench coat with exo-suit vest, a cowboy hat with NanoCorps' symbol, a mask that covers his upper face with high tech sunglasses, gloves, pants with gun holster and cowboy boots.

Personality: Somewhat like Zeke, Zurge is a silent yet wise gunman who enjoys sniping off bad guys . When talking, he sounds like old, gruff, western cowboy with knowledge of an elder. Zurge is a great partner and friend to the mercenaries and shows a fierce yet friendly rival to Zeke.

Powers & Abilities: Compare to Zeke's master marksmanship, Zurge is the second best of shooting people at such large distance-only with his special dual magnum pistols: The Reapers. He has good keen eyesight with the help of his sunglasses.




The Silent Killer
Name: Zark

Age: Unknown

NanoCorps' Rank: Stealth/Assassin

Gender: Male

Height: 7'4"

Race: Unknown (Human?)

Appearance: Zark is a mysterious tall, slight muscular man who doesn't reveal any personal life to anyone, even to his fellow mercenaries and not many see his face due to him concealing all the time. Zark wears a long black hooded trench coat made by Beta with a large skull imprint on the back, matching black pants, gloves and boots, and a silver mask that resembles a skeleton's face.

Personality: True to his title. Zark is a silent muted man that some believe he does not talk, giving others the cold shoulder, and very ruthless to anyone who is his target or getting in his way of killing one. However, he does have a soft side and quite loyal to his leaders. He often communicates with his allies by giving them a thumbs up.

Powers & Abilities: Zark moves very fast, so fast that he can disappear in a blink of an eye, even some of the mercenaries thought he can warp through space. His quick reflexes and sharp instinct makes him a very dangerous as he able to dodge a bullet at point blank and during a stealth-based mission, Zark was able to reach his destination within minutes without raising alarms. Zark uses Assassin's Kill style that will quickly dispose his targets with a single chop or just one of his fingers against vital points.




The Green Warrior
Name: Orn

Age: Unknown

NanoCorps' Rank: Frontline

Gender: Male

Height: 8'12"

Race: Namekian

Appearance: Orn is a very tall muscular Namekian with a large scar on his right eye. As a Namekian, Orn has antennae, light green skin, and pink patches appearing throughout his body, pointy ears, and three red conjoined rings on his ankles and wrists. Orn wears a black and gold armored vest with NanoCorps' symbol on the back, an eye patch over his scarred right eye, black gi pants, and black and gold boots.

Personality: Orn is a very cold, quiet, and grumpy hunter who prefers to be alone when not on a mission, though he pairs up with Zark which works great for the two. He respects the leaders and fellow mercenaries, but he tends to challenge Quentin in a spar, but Viz will get in his way and the two ended up fighting each other.

Powers & Abilities: With newly implanted of Atomic's Ω-DNA, combined with his natural Namekian abilities, Orn is considered to be one of the strongest mercenaries in NanoCorps, right near Quentin and Cross's level. If activated the DNA, his green-skinned body turns shiny silver like Atomic's, increasing his strength and durance, but the green warrior rarely uses it as he rather uses his own strength, but will use the DNA if it's an emergency. As a Namekian, he retains his regeneration, stretching limbs, and enhanced senses.




The Undead Knight
Name: Unknown (Revenant by NanoCorps' mercenaries)

Age: Unknown

NanoCorps' Rank: Protector/Swordsman

Gender: Male

Height: 16'12"

Race: Undead

Appearance: While not showing any physical body or possibly having one, Revenant is an extremely tall and bulky appearing knight that can intimidate anyone who laid sight at him and breathe out a black mist. Revenant wears a set of heavy black armor with skull face-shaped pauldrons with spikes, horned helmet, and tattered cape. He carries the giant blade Grimblade on his back.

Personality: Although he appears menacing and terrifying in the eyes of others, Revenant has a gentle nature. He is very calm and level-headed with a sense of honor that the mercenaries view him as a 'gentle giant'. He has a habit of shielding the female mercenaries from any danger, making the womanizer Danny a bit jealous of him. Like Froze, the knight vows to protect innocent people from any harm. In battle, Revenant retains his calm personality, even warns his opponent to stand down before they get hurt. However, he'll get serious and shows no mercy if his opponent will not back down multiple times.

Powers & Abilities: Blessed by the dark deity and being a powerful swordsman, Revenant is one of the strongest and terrifying members of the NanoCorps. His armor is impenetrable and seemingly invincible, he wield the giant Grimblade with ease, uses dark arts to defeat his foes or empower his sword, and has the ability to summon the Abyss Knights of the Twelve (6 knights, 3 archers, 3 mages) to aid him in battle and also summons very powerful male high commander and female high court mage.





The Giant Weapon of Destruction
Name: Alpha

Age: 1

NanoCorps’ Rank: Frontline/Protector/The Big 6

Gender: Genderless(has a male voice)

Height: 30’12”

Race: A.I

Appearance: Alpha is a massive created machine, built by his ‘father’ Beta, about the same height as Atomic. On the front of his armor has the NanoCorps’ symbols.

Personality: Like Beta and Delta, Alpha does not have any emotions and feelings and has free will to do anything, and only follows the NanoCorps’ leaders and other mercenaries’ orders.

Powers & Abilities: Alpha’s high dense armor and massive superhuman abilities make him another dangerous member of the Big 6 and able to match Atomic’s strength. He possesses numerous weapons with unlimited ammo and willing to share to the mercenaries. His boosters granted him to fly and said has the ability to transform into a hovercraft that can carry multiple people.

Personality: Skylar is an easy going and laid back member who has a big weakness to a beautiful woman, making him shudder and moves away from them which is opposite of Danny’s, but it does not affect him on missions. He does have a big crush on Flare and wanted to express his feelings towards her, but was nervous to do it.

Powers & Abilities: As a former marine, Skylar is very skillful in martial arts and marksmanship, and an ace pilot which gives him the ‘Buzzboy’ nickname. He also brings his two large, highly trained birds known as the Direagles, an extremely rare and strong bird species that was once thought to be extinct, named Jet and Dash, to aid their ‘father’ in a mission to either distract enemies or carrying objects.

Powers & Abilities: Rival to Zark’s abilities, Shadow is one of the best assassins for his stealth and speed, enhanced strength and high dense armor. Trained under Vixen, Jackle is a strong combater, combing with his electricity makes him a dangerous fighter.

He wears the NanoCorps suit colored black and red, black pants and boots.

He can paralyze his victims if his blood weapon able to cut them, and, like Quentin, has Dragon Glare, the ability to stop and paralyze anyone who falls to his imitating gaze.

After Beta repair and changing his body by replacing the rocks with the hardest minerals in the world: the carbon nanorods, Boulder’s body is silver colored with a few lights on his torso, arms and legs, large hands with five fingers, a single glowing blue ‘eye’, and has the letter ‘NC’ engraved on the torso.

Personality: As a golem, Boulder cannot talk and only has one simple, but limited personality: loyalty. He only follows orders from anyone back in the days. Once Beta implanted a chip to make ‘more intelligence’, the golem becomes more intelligence yet loyalty, able to understand the situation he’s in and join in to save his fellow teammates.

Powers & Abilities: Boulder possess superhuman strength and durability, and has the body of the strongest mineral makes him a dangerous opponent for his challengers. Like Zaviera, Boulder learns geokinesis as he can fuse rocks and boulders with one hand to gain more power.

Like Frieza who acquired a new transformation called Golden Form, Froze possess a unique transformation that no other Frieza’s race has: Ruby Form. The Ruby Form is much like Golden Form except it changes his skin into shiny ruby color and massively boosts his abilities.

Dave does work together with the mercs, sometimes flirting with the female mercs, but not as bad as Danny.

His Chaos Control can stop time around him and attack his foes before deactivate it, warp into different locations and teleport his allies into a location they describe and another ability called Chaos Rift, a portal created by X that allows him to enter the rift or use it to absorb projectiles and send it right back to the user.

After becoming a beast, Wolffang has superhuman abilities, enhanced senses, and regeneration. .
